placeInfo: {'id': '14033359', 'name': 'Le Grand Galle', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1198, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.031802, 'longitude': 80.21252, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d14033359-Reviews-Le_Grand_Galle-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.legrandgalle.lk/', 'address': 'No. 30 Park Road, Kaluwalla, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'No. 30 Park Road, Kaluwalla', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 18, 'count3': 29, 'count4': 121, 'count5': 1001}}
text:
As the other reviews state, it's a beautiful hotel commanding sweeping views of Galle Fort. In particular, a sunset swim in their sleek pool is recommended.

It's a ten-minute walk away from the fort's entrance and cricket ground, although a LKR500 tuk-tuk ride should land you there a little less sweaty. The breakfast there is no buffet, but they offer generous a la carte options, including a Sri Lankan breakfast, which is enough to split between two.

The staff are attentive and friendly. As we had a midnight flight out of Colombo airport, they accommodated a late check out (for USD10/hour).

If I were to quibble, I'll ding them on two issues:
1. There was some renovation work at the hotel, making our room noisy at times (so it may be an idea to ask ahead if you're sensitive to noise).
2. Power cuts were a constant feature of our stay.
title: Beautiful and well located

placeInfo: {'id': '14033359', 'name': 'Le Grand Galle', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1198, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.031802, 'longitude': 80.21252, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d14033359-Reviews-Le_Grand_Galle-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.legrandgalle.lk/', 'address': 'No. 30 Park Road, Kaluwalla, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'No. 30 Park Road, Kaluwalla', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 18, 'count3': 29, 'count4': 121, 'count5': 1001}}
text: This was such a lovely hotel, and the view was AMAZING!!! It is within walking distance of the fort which is lovely to walk around in the evening. The staff are all very friendly and helpful - nothing is too much!! We came in off season so there was no breakfast buffet but this didn’t matter as they had so much food to offer!! I had a full english breakfast, and a crepe, delicious!! The bed was so comfy too, and the pool area has a nice bar.
title: Great stay!

text: Our stay at Le Grand Galle Hotel was generally positive. The room was clean, and the staff was very accommodating. However, we found the restaurant to be quite expensive compared to Sri Lankan standards, and the food quality didn't match the price. The hotel's location is excellent, just a five-minute walk from Galle Fort. Unfortunately, due to the rainy season, we couldn't fully enjoy the pool and outdoor areas. The breakfast was good, and the service was attentive, though sometimes overly so. Overall, a decent experience with room for improvement in the dining area and prices.
title: It was a nice stay but...

placeInfo: {'id': '14033359', 'name': 'Le Grand Galle', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1198, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.031802, 'longitude': 80.21252, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d14033359-Reviews-Le_Grand_Galle-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.legrandgalle.lk/', 'address': 'No. 30 Park Road, Kaluwalla, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'No. 30 Park Road, Kaluwalla', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 18, 'count3': 29, 'count4': 121, 'count5': 1001}}
text:
If you’re someone who loves waking up to the sound of waves and breathtaking ocean views, this hotel is a dream come true. The moment you step into the property, you’re greeted with a calm and serene atmosphere that immediately sets the tone for a relaxing stay. The highlight, without a doubt, is the unobstructed ocean view from almost every corner of the hotel, whether it’s from your room, the pool, or the dining areas.

Despite offering all the luxuries and amenities you’d expect from a 5-star hotel, the price is surprisingly affordable. You get a premium experience without the hefty price tag that’s usually associated with such high-end resorts. The rooms are spacious, modern, and well-equipped, with large windows that let you soak in the beauty of the ocean. The staff is incredibly attentive and go out of their way to ensure you have a comfortable stay.

Beyond just the views, the hotel offers excellent facilities including a world-class spa, a well-maintained pool, and various dining options that serve delicious food. Whether you’re lounging by the pool or enjoying a meal with the ocean as your backdrop, the hotel provides a luxurious yet laid-back atmosphere that makes you feel pampered throughout your stay.

For those looking for a balance between luxury, comfort, and affordability, this 5-star hotel delivers on all fronts. It’s a must-visit for anyone who appreciates the beauty of the ocean and is looking for a memorable getaway without breaking the bank.
title: One of the best ocean view with fort view

text:
One of my favorite hotels in all of Sri Lanka!
Stunning layout with lovely open air reception and perched on the seaside with great views of the fort.
No beach for swimming bur the lovely pool makes up for that. Rooms are spacious and try get a sea view room as that makes all the difference.
Only a short 15 min walk yo the Fort.
If on this area this is the place to stay
title: Stunning place to stay

placeInfo: {'id': '14033359', 'name': 'Le Grand Galle', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1198, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.031802, 'longitude': 80.21252, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d14033359-Reviews-Le_Grand_Galle-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.legrandgalle.lk/', 'address': 'No. 30 Park Road, Kaluwalla, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'No. 30 Park Road, Kaluwalla', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 18, 'count3': 29, 'count4': 121, 'count5': 1001}}
text: We stayed at this hotel twice at the beginning and end to a round tour.  We have always wanted to stay here although August is a very busy period and the hotel has been full.  This time we booked well in advance.  We enjoyed the stay and at times felt the hotel is not maintained properly and we informed a few issues regarding the room etc.  This was taken care of and the second time it was a great experience.  Also during our second visit I was feeling unwell and I mentioned it at breakfast to the lovely young (lady) restaurant manager.  She was extremely kind and quickly recommended a tea they could offer.  This tea was a miracle and I felt better later in the day and fully recovered.  I would love to thank the manager, sorry don’t know her name.  We had a little chat, she is very helpful and kind and Sri Lankan hospitality right there which we are so proud of.  Staff are also amazing and very hard working.
title: Wonderful staff !!

text: We stayed at Le Grand Galle for our honeymoon and highly recommend it. The hotel provided a free room upgrade, the staff were incredibly friendly, and the food was delicious. The rooms were modern, equipped with the latest technology, and very clean. The hotel also offers stunning views with direct beach access, which made it even more special. We chose this location for our wedding photographs as there were many beautiful photo spots around the property.
title: Unforgettable Memories at Le Grand Galle

placeInfo: {'id': '14033359', 'name': 'Le Grand Galle', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1198, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.031802, 'longitude': 80.21252, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d14033359-Reviews-Le_Grand_Galle-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.legrandgalle.lk/', 'address': 'No. 30 Park Road, Kaluwalla, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'No. 30 Park Road, Kaluwalla', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 18, 'count3': 29, 'count4': 121, 'count5': 1001}}
text:
If you are looking for calm and quiet place around the Galle bound, then Le Grand is best place to stay. 
Rooms are clean and have a nice view. 
Food is average. There’s no wide range of foods. Staff is friendly and their service is also excellent. 
There’s a tuck park in front of the hotel and they threaten to guests as well as Uber/pick me drivers saying that we can’t use such service around the hotel. The hotel management needs to pay attention to this matter.
title: Le Grand

text: I recently enjoyed a wonderful two-night stay at La Grande Hotel Galle in their luxurious Jacuzzi suite. The suite was spacious, elegantly designed, and offered stunning views of the ocean. The private Jacuzzi added a touch of relaxation and indulgence, making the experience truly unforgettable. The hotel staff was incredibly attentive, ensuring all our needs were met promptly. The on-site dining was excellent, offering a variety of delicious local and international dishes. The location, close to the Galle Fort, made exploring easy and enjoyable. Highly recommend for a relaxing getaway!
title: Luxurious and Relaxing Stay in the Jacuzzi Suite – A Perfect Getaway!

roomTip: There is a small white bridge that crosses from near the hotel over to the Galle Fort it is the shorter way there.  Ask the staff to direct.
text: This Hotel is definitely 5 star with a view of Galle Fort and the beach from poolside.  The weather turned on us and it rained a lot but the luxury of this hotel made up for the weather.  The staff were friendly and the rooms spacious and clean.    The artwork in the reception area and basically everywhere was amazing I could of looked at the artwork all day.  The only bar is at the Pool Bar - this became a problem when the weather became quite wild and made it difficult for anyone to be at the Pool Bar without getting drenched.  I think maybe another bar in the Blue Restaurant might be the solution so staff won't get wet delivering drinks from the Pool Bar.  Having said this the staff looked after us very well whilst we sat in the Blue Restaurant waiting out the rain.  We would definitely come back to this hotel on another trip to Sri Lanka.
title: Luxurious and we were very spoilt.

roomTip: Wonderfull place and helpful workers
text:
Le Grand made my trip Amazing. I stayed in a Premium room, and the facilities and view were wonderful.

The staff was very kind and supportive. Special attention was given by Agent AWANTHA, who provided excellent service and helped arrange our Galle tour. The check-in process was smooth, and he provided all the necessary information about Galle's attractions, the hotel's amenities, and the room details.

The hotel's location is fantastic, overlooking Galle Fort, where you can enjoy a beautiful sunset and walk through the fort.

When we were going through checkout, the process was handled quickly and nicely  by the same attentive agent.

I will definitely visit again and highly recommend it to anyone seeking a top-notch experience in the south. Please visit Le Grand Galle; you will have a truly memorable experience.

Finally, I would like to thank all the supportive staff members for their great help in making our vacation enjoyable.
title: Amazing vacation in Le Grand

text:
One of the best views I have had across my travels in Asia. Staff were the most welcoming with special attention reduced from the beautiful Tarushi our Guest Manager. The receptionist (I wish I saw his name) was wonderful and he helped make arrangements to make our anniversary trip even more special right from the time we stepped in the hotel.

Great breakfast buffet options and the rooms are spacious yet cozy with huge wardrobe storage and open bath 🛁 

If it is Galle, Le Grande should be a must with its view of the ocean, clock tower of the Galle Fort and a brisk 10 min walk to all the lovely cafés inside the Fort.
title: 5 Stars 🌟

text:
We picked this hotel following lots of research on YouTube . The fact it had a wonderful view of the fort was a massive selling point and didn’t disappoint .
We had a room upgrade to a sea view as it was our wedding anniversary and a  small cake both much appreciated.
Overall good facilities , pool area , restaurant for breakfast,  gym . staff very friendly  and attentive .
My reason for 4 and not 5 star was the fact you couldn’t always get through to room service, housekeeping , bell service despite repeated redials . 
I would stay here again
title: I would recommend this hotel

roomTip: If you are big into your Instagram pictures and want a photographic pool with wild ocean views (and Fort), you will love this.
text: Beautiful modern contemporary hotel right at the walls of Galle Fort.  Very contemporary-designed hotel (right up there with anything in Europe).  Very modern and spacious rooms and layout.  Pool is a very good size and depth, and its green coloring and the view across to the Fort make it an Instagrammers dream (definitely improved the quality of our family album).  Food is very good and the service excellent.   Hotel even has a small beach for swimming below the pool in its own little cove.  Location is on a headland right beside the Fort which is a 10 min walk away (or 5 min by tuk-tuk).   Felt like a solid 9.0 bookings.com hotel.
title: Beautiful modern contemporary hotel right at the walls of Galle Fort

roomTip: Free Parking available
text:
This was one of the best hotels we have stayed so far. The hotel is very clean and well maintained.

Rooms are very clean, well maintained and spacious, I would recommend you to get a Signature category room since this room is very beautiful with a japanese type bathroom.

The pool has a small jacuzzi and the pool is very clean.

The food was great, had many varieties and tasty.

View from the room and hotel is amazing, you can see a marvelous view of the galle fort and the Indian ocean.

For a Complete Hotel Review Video we did at this property and for more hotel review videos visit my YouTube channel mentioned in the profile description.
title: One of the Best Hotel Stays! Clean well maintained rooms & Breathtaking Views!

roomTip: Decide on our meals beforehand so that you don't have to wait for long.
text: Yara Galle is a cosy property that truly signifies a home away from home. The level of service catered towards the guest is unparalleled. We HIGHLY RECOMMEND the Yara Galle Fort Hotel!
title: Location with Style

roomTip: Plenty of Parking Available right opposite the property.
text: Fantastic Stay at Yara Galle Fort. Beautiful Property with very clean rooms. The staff was very pleasant and obliging. Located right opposite the ramparts. Easy access to many of the tourist hot spots, spas and shopping areas. Super Stay!
title: Family Getaway to Galle Fort

placeInfo: {'id': '14916776', 'name': 'Yara Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 273, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.028811, 'longitude': 80.215515, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d14916776-Reviews-Yara_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://yarahotels.lk/', 'address': 'NO 40 Middle Street Fort, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'NO 40 Middle Street', 'street2': 'Fort', 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 3, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 5, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 237}}
text: Not quite sure how this hotel manages to get a five star rating. This was the last hotel of five in an eight night stay in Sri Lanka and we were extremely disappointed. We were doing a package trip and were not informed that they had no alcohol licence but they were happy to let us bring our own wine. For dinner we had to select in advance our dinner choices from 2 options for each course. At dinner we realised it was because we were the only guests. My chicken main course was extremely over salted and the vegetables were cold. On the positive side the staff were extremely helpful once you found them. I’m sorry but our worst experience in Sri Lanka.
title: Worst experience in Sri Lanka

placeInfo: {'id': '14916776', 'name': 'Yara Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 273, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.028811, 'longitude': 80.215515, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d14916776-Reviews-Yara_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://yarahotels.lk/', 'address': 'NO 40 Middle Street Fort, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'NO 40 Middle Street', 'street2': 'Fort', 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 3, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 5, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 237}}
text: Beautiful quaint hotel very boutique, wonderfully attentive service. Our room was beautifully decorated in blue and white and the bathroom was very nice with good water pressure. There is a gorgeous frangipani courtyard to eat in and location is central to all the attractions of old town. Very clean and lovely to stay in. As advertised no alcohol on premises but with so many hotels near by we honestly didn't even notice.
title: Bespoke boutique hotel with delicious food and warm attentive service

placeInfo: {'id': '14916776', 'name': 'Yara Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 273, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.028811, 'longitude': 80.215515, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d14916776-Reviews-Yara_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://yarahotels.lk/', 'address': 'NO 40 Middle Street Fort, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'NO 40 Middle Street', 'street2': 'Fort', 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 3, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 5, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 237}}
text:
Yara Galle Fort is an amazing small boutique hotel. It is very conveniently located within the heart of Galle so you can walk out and its all on your doorstep.
The hotel  is immaculate and the decor is really beautiful.
The manger Mr Luckshalyan was an amazing host. Very kind and attentive.
The food was delicious both dinner and breakfast. They catered really well for vegetarians also. Our stay was short but lovely. Would love to go back to spend more time there.
title: Beautiful hotel. Amazing manager.

placeInfo: {'id': '14916776', 'name': 'Yara Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 273, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.028811, 'longitude': 80.215515, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d14916776-Reviews-Yara_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://yarahotels.lk/', 'address': 'NO 40 Middle Street Fort, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'NO 40 Middle Street', 'street2': 'Fort', 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 3, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 5, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 237}}
roomTip: There are a couple rooms right off the restaurant and lobby, these are very noisy so make sure you ask not for one of these.
text:
Nice small hotel located in a great location within the old fort of Galle.  Rooms are good sized with lots of character and charm.

Easy walking to all the interesting sites at Galle fort including bars and restaurants.

There are some big rooms upstairs for more than 2 people and these are really nice, high ceilings and lots of space.
title: Nice hotel with character and charm in good location

text: The food was very delicious and arrived fast. I ordered the prawn curry and rice. It came with a lot of side dishes. The courtyard was beautiful and quiet. The waitress Nethmi was the friendliest person I’ve met in Sri Lanka. I definitely recommend this place.
title: Go here if you want delicious food

placeInfo: {'id': '14916776', 'name': 'Yara Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 273, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.028811, 'longitude': 80.215515, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d14916776-Reviews-Yara_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://yarahotels.lk/', 'address': 'NO 40 Middle Street Fort, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'NO 40 Middle Street', 'street2': 'Fort', 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 3, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 5, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 237}}
text: Had some nice fried rice. Good atmosphere and a nice building. Also a lot of Delfts blauw on the walls. Here we had the best cappuccino in Sri Lanka. Very nice and friendly staff. They were very kind to talk to us about regular day life in Sri Lanka. 👌
title: Review Yara fort

placeInfo: {'id': '14916776', 'name': 'Yara Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 273, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.028811, 'longitude': 80.215515, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d14916776-Reviews-Yara_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://yarahotels.lk/', 'address': 'NO 40 Middle Street Fort, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'NO 40 Middle Street', 'street2': 'Fort', 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 3, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 5, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 237}}
roomTip: Ensure you have the Sri Lankan breakfast!!
text:
We had a lovely one night at Yara Galle Fort (sad not to do more).  We were welcomed with a cold towel and a refreshing drink and shown to our rooms.  The setting is beautiful, very lush and peaceful.  The room was spotless and had excellent facilities, really nice toiletries!

The dinner menu was delicious-I highly recommend the prawn curry and the lovely waiter recommended I have the tuna and green bean salad as it was his favourite and it was very good! 

We were really well looked after by the lovely staff.  Farhath was particularly wonderful!  He made us the best coffee we have had in Sri Lanka by far with Sri Lankan coffee beans.  Sitting in the courtyard, drinking a good Sri Lankan coffee made by Farhath was idyllic!
title: A lovely stay with the best coffee!!

placeInfo: {'id': '14916776', 'name': 'Yara Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 273, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.028811, 'longitude': 80.215515, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d14916776-Reviews-Yara_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://yarahotels.lk/', 'address': 'NO 40 Middle Street Fort, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'NO 40 Middle Street', 'street2': 'Fort', 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 3, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 5, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 237}}
roomTip:
If its not too hot enjoy the walk around the fort - no need to tuk tuk.
Lots of places to eat drink and shop nearby.
Close to Bank and ATM is only 300 meters away.
text:
Great location in the middle of town but very quiet and secluded by the entry.
The rooms were very well presented and comfortable,  whilst the inside courtyard was a pleasant place to rest after a long walk.
The staff were always helpful and available if we needed directing.
The walk is 5 minutes to the ramparts and we self guided yourself around the fort.
On our first night we enjoyed a sunset walk and watched all of the locals flying kites, playing games and enjoying the views.

Highly recommend the YGF.
title: Peaceful in the middle of Galle fort

placeInfo: {'id': '14916776', 'name': 'Yara Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 273, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.028811, 'longitude': 80.215515, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d14916776-Reviews-Yara_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://yarahotels.lk/', 'address': 'NO 40 Middle Street Fort, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'NO 40 Middle Street', 'street2': 'Fort', 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 3, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 5, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 237}}
text:
The staff was incredibly friendly and attentive, ensuring all my needs were met. The rooms were clean, comfortable, and well-maintained.
The location was perfect, close to many attractions and convenient for exploring the area. I would recommend the hotel
title: Hotel with nice surrounding

roomTip: Easy walk from the main fort entrance
text:
What a lovely experience we had. We got the bolognaise, fish and chips, Caesar salad and the mango and calamari salad. All of the food was delicious and the service from Nethmi and Chathuranga was attentive and polite.
Highly recommend coming for a meal.
Bathrooms are lovely and clean.

text: We went to the restaurant- Fortyard. It was just the sort of quaint, peaceful, Portuguese place that we wanted 😀. The food was fresh and amazing. We had a lovely conversation with Mithun, the cafe in charge. If you like cricket, we can guarantee you’ll have a lively discussion with him 😊. Overall, the location, food and service make this a place to come back to.
title: Loved Fortyard Cafe

text: Beautiful decor and most comfortable rooms, with amazing bed and huge shower. All amenities within 5 minutes walk and just off the main wall entrance. Very helpful staff and delicious breakfast. We will definitely come back if we return to Galle

placeInfo: {'id': '14916776', 'name': 'Yara Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 273, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.028811, 'longitude': 80.215515, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d14916776-Reviews-Yara_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://yarahotels.lk/', 'address': 'NO 40 Middle Street Fort, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'NO 40 Middle Street', 'street2': 'Fort', 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 3, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 5, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 237}}
text:
I booked a Superior Double Room for 3 nights
Hotel is within the Galle Fort walls and the hotel building itself is very nicely presented.
Upon checking in we were allocated the Duplex Room which is situated just inside the front doors and overlooks the restaurant.  I did not check my booking details and realise this was not what I had booked). The Duplex Room is very nice but the bathroom is down stairs (two flights) but the main issue was the noise from the restaurant which the bedroom window overlooks. Noise from the restaurant and the staff clearing up after service kept us awake - which was quite annoying.
The following day we asked to move rooms and initially they tried to put us in a Double Room rather than the Superior Double which I had booked. After discussion and time spent packing up again we were allocated the correct room.
This saga was annoying as it cost us sleep and time and it would appear as they had overbooked the Superior Rooms we were put into the Duplex Room.
The allocated room was very nice. It was clean, tastefully furnished and quiet.
Breakfast was served in the pleasant courtyard and was acceptable.
Note: There is no alcohol served at the bar / restaurant of this hotel.
The day before we departed I ordered two take away breakfast as were were leaving at 6am. In the morning there were no breakfast packages and in fact no staff around at all. This was disappointing so we ended up spending $30.00 on some dried out tasteless food at the airport.
If the staff had got the details correct with the bookings (room and breakfast) I would recommend this hotel.
title: Nice hotel - make sure you get the correct room and clarify your breakfast order!!

placeInfo: {'id': '14916776', 'name': 'Yara Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 273, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.028811, 'longitude': 80.215515, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d14916776-Reviews-Yara_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://yarahotels.lk/', 'address': 'NO 40 Middle Street Fort, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'NO 40 Middle Street', 'street2': 'Fort', 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 3, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 5, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 237}}

text:
Stayed here on a Secret Escapes trip. Arrived as school was finishing so traffic surrounding is bad which is worth noting. 

Room was very smart with nice old Dutch style furniture

Bed very comfortable as were the pillows. 

Air con very good and quiet. 

WiFi was broken unfortunately so no connection bit 4G in area was sufficient. 

Safe in the room as well as ability to lock wardrobe. 

Staff very friendly 

We didn’t have any of the food as we opted to go out for dinner, most seem to do the same as didn’t see many people around eating at all for the time we were there. 

Overall very nice place!
title: Very nice I’m good location

placeInfo: {'id': '14916776', 'name': 'Yara Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 273, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.028811, 'longitude': 80.215515, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d14916776-Reviews-Yara_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://yarahotels.lk/', 'address': 'NO 40 Middle Street Fort, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'NO 40 Middle Street', 'street2': 'Fort', 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 3, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 5, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 237}}
roomTip:
No car needed to explore inside the fort.
Hotel has no pool, so might be difficult to entertain kids.
text:
The Yara boutique hotel is perfectly positioned inside the walls of Galle Fort, making it an easy and centrally located hotel for exploring the shops and restaurants that are plentiful in this historically significant town.

The hotel is operated by a friendly and professional team of staff.  The hotel has a restaurant on site.  Regrettably no pool on site which is a shame given the heat and humidity.

Our room, on the upstairs level was tastefully decorated and well proportioned in size.  A super comfortable bed and a surprisingly quite location given it’s proximity to town.

Highly recommended a stay for couples.
title: Fantastic boutique hotel inside Galle Fort

placeInfo: {'id': '14916776', 'name': 'Yara Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 273, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.028811, 'longitude': 80.215515, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d14916776-Reviews-Yara_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://yarahotels.lk/', 'address': 'NO 40 Middle Street Fort, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'NO 40 Middle Street', 'street2': 'Fort', 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 3, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 5, 'count4': 26, 'count5': 237}}
text: We stayed for 2 nights here with 2 adults and 2 teenagers. A great location to explore Galle Fort from. The hotel is beautifully decorated and has a cosy atmosphere. The rooms are very comfortable. The highlight is the friendly staff who meet every request with a smile and make sure guests have everything they need. Special mention goes to Upeka who contacted me directly when my son had forgotten his phone charger after we’d checked out and even dropped it round to our next hotel where we were staying about 10mins away. The only reason I didn’t give this place 5 stars is because we were there for NYE and had to pay for a “compulsory” NYE dinner which was US$76pp. We didn’t mind at the time as we expected a high quality dinner for this price. Unfortunately the food did not meet expectations, and it put us off dining at the hotel altogether (except for ice creams and drinks). We would have much preferred going to another restaurant in the Fort, many of which served up excellent cuisine and only a few minutes walk away.
title: Boutique Hotel with Great Accommodation and Service

text: Really friendly and helpful staff which was the best part, but all of it was great. The room was very comfortable, and the food was delicious  - breakfasts and dinner too. roomTip: It is a beautiful hotel. Please insist on removing glass bottles inside the shower.
text: Glass bottles are not okay inside a shower. They think their commitment to sustainability means even the shampoo bottle in the shower has to be glass. With wet hands, it is easy for them to slip off your hands and that is exactly what happened. The bottle smashed into pieces while I'm barefoot inside the shower. They were hardly receptive to my complaint and didn't seem to understand when i pointed out that no store even sells glass shampoo bottles and that's for the risk it poses inside a wet place. They need to attach those bottles to the walls if they insist on glass bottles. Instead, just be sensible and put a guests safety first by having bottles that won't break inside the shower.
title: Broken glass bottles inside the shower!

roomTip: Suite with plunge pool is recommended if you're looking for a spacious room with the privacy of your own mini pool and Jacuzzi.
text:
We had a wonderful memorable experience at this hotel. I booked a suite with a plunge pool and it was very spacious & clean. The room was good value for money and is a perfect choice if you're looking for a spacious room with the privacy of having your own mini pool and a fully functional Jacuzzi in the room which my 2 year old enjoyed most. 

The staff was very friendly and supportive as i was travelling with my 2 year old. I would like to specially mention and thank Mr. Pradeep for his very hospitable service who was hosting us from check-in to check-out, guided us about the history and design of this resort building and catered all our requirements throughout our stay even serving us during our meals at the restaurant.  I even requested for a late check-out and the staff were very flexible with the request.

Overall I would recommend this resort for anyone planning for a peaceful get away.
title: Recommended for all, very hospitable and friendly staff...

text:
We loved the stay because its so peaceful and also the hotel was really well built to satisfy the customers. The room we got was with a plung pool overlooking the sunset which was perfect. 

Food was also good when they served buffet (breakfast). But the a’lacart dinner could have been better. All in all this was an awesome experience for us and we are fully satisfied. Thanks a lot Jetwing 

Our personal butler was Jayan and he was super helpful throughout our stay.
title: Awesome experience in the heart of galle

placeInfo: {'id': '302888', 'name': 'Jetwing Lighthouse', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 2711, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.042279, 'longitude': 80.19482, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d302888-Reviews-Jetwing_Lighthouse-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwinglighthouse/', 'address': '433 A Dadella, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '433 A Dadella', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 54, 'count2': 52, 'count3': 203, 'count4': 651, 'count5': 1753}}
roomTip: Very spacious rooms. There is a lift in the hotel so no problem for those not able to climb stairs. Stunning location.
text:
What an utterly stunning location! Really beautiful, right at the edge of the Indian Ocean, almost at the Southern tip of Sri Lanka. The location is top notch and simply for that the hotel is worth heading to. The architecture of the hotel is not ostentatious but blends with the environment around. The rooms are very large, very nicely done up, with individual balconies, large window and door looking out on the tiny beach and the ocean beyond. Washroom within the rooms was very large and comfortable with all the usual Jetwing toileteries.

Service, while fine, needs refinement, as it ranges from good service with a smile to downright grumpy in the main restaurant. Some hotel workers are very pleasant but others seem not keen on their jobs and this was more glaring at the main restaurant than in other locations. The management needs to invest more in training to the staff.

The food also was not the best among the Jetwing hotels where I have stayed in Sri Lanka, and at best can be rated as 2.5 out of 5. Location would get a 4.75 out of 5.

Conference service was also good and no complaints there.
title: Stunning location, very nice architecture, food & service needs improvement

text:
We stopped for lunch at Jetwing Lighthouse on our way to Weligama.
Our experience at the restaurant was fantastic. The team was attentive and helped us select the best menu items, making sure we felt comfortable throughout our dining experience.
The food was delicious and beautifully presented. We especially enjoyed the mocktails, soup, and desserts they offered. I’d like to highlight the Wattalappan, which was a truly authentic experience.
Additionally, the restaurant offers a magnificent sea view, and you can feel the refreshing sea breeze if you choose to sit outside.
title: Dine with a refreshing sea breeze

text: We had a lovely day in jetwing kurulubedda in September 2024, food was good,staff was friendly but had an unexpected bitter incident due to their online paying system.we paid via amex and there is no portal to pay by amex in their website. So as they mentioned after calling customer service hotline of jetwing they asked us to pay to their cooperative office. So we did as they asked and we got a confirmation email too. In the departure time the hotel management asked us to pay again because our payment was not VISIBLE due to their lack of knowledge about their own system. We got  delayed for nearly an hour because of this. So mind it when you pay via amex online to this hotel. They should be mindful and knowledgeable about their own payment methods more.
title: Not easy to do online payments

text:
We choose Jetwing Lighthouse to celebrate our beloved mom's birthday . We had a grand time!
For me Jetwing Lighthouse is my favourite resort in Galle. I have many loving & fond  memories at this hotel. From my wedding in 2010  to all my amazing milestones in my life I have chosen this loving place to celebrate.
Jetwing Lighthouse always has a special place in my heart.
My mom was delighed with the experience!
Food was just scrumptious! 
Head Chef Mr.Nalin has done a magnificent job to cater our needs. He even personally checked on us. He did his best to satisfy us.He surprised us with a lovely birthday cake as well!
Thank you so much Chef!
All staff we made contact were really gracious & so helpful. But I want to spcially highlight two individuals who have performed suberbly to keep us entertained.
Ms.Umesha & Mr.Isuru @  Cardamom Cafe were exceptional. 
Specially Ms.Umesha , a very dynamic individual who always made sure that we were thoroughly satisfied. At such a young age the way she entertained the guests is really impresive!
Thank you so much Ms.Umesha!
Ms.Dersika & Mr.Leel , Thank you so much for everything!These two wonderful human beings have been always so supportive to me through out whole time. They are the main reasons why I remain loyal to Jetwing Lighthouse.
(When I have made a booking with Jetwing Blue two months ago Mr.Leel & Mr.Dersika have done everything to fullfill our satisafation by making arrangements with Jetwing Blue staff.)
Long live Jetwing Lighthouse!
title: Perfect Dining Experience ❤

text:
We stayed for 3 nights at this pearl of a hotel at the sea in Galle. The hotel
Is situated close to the old fort which can be visited for a drink or diner after a short tuk tuk ride.
The hotel itself is a very special architectural building with many beautiful accents but above all two fantastic swimming pools from which you have view of the ocean.
A fantastic breakfast buffet, great restaurants for lunch and diner and very friendly staff! Also a great gym!
title: Perfect place for a relaxed stay in Galle

text:
Amazing experience right from the Check-In to Check-Out.

Rooms were great, with a great view of the ocean. Interior was very calming. Room was fully equipped with room entertainment items (a smart TV and a JBL speaker).

Food was good. We had set menus and buffets and overall it was tasty and had variety. Need to mention the desserts were the highlight as they were really delicious.

Pools were clean and claiming.
Gym was well equipped and well maintained.

The butler team organized a kids activity which my daughter enjoyed a lot. Thanks to the team there.

Overall it was a wonderful stay. Highly recommended.
title: Amazing Experience right next to the Beach

ownerResponse:
{'id': '961650157', 'text': 'Dear Guest,

text: Beautiful place right on the beach. Amazing staff, very friendly and go above and beyond for everyone here. Super clean rooms, bathroom, shower and bath were very clean, beds were comfortable, and I love it when I get 2 large pillows to lay on, makes my whole stay so much more comfortable. Ceiling fan in the rooms was the perfect touch. The outlook to beach from the rooms is gorgeous. The pools were spotless and the deep one is such a nice refresher for laps and paddling. Meal times were slightly chaotic, food could be a tad bit warmer but that’s nitpicking. All around pleasant experience, thank you!
title: Beautiful spot right on the beach

text:
This was my 10th visit to this beautiful property. 

The Spa Wing rooms are simply fantastic with panoramic views of the Indian ocean as you are serenaded by the sound of crashing waves, that create a tranquil and serene atmosphere, perfect for a relaxing getaway. The swimming pool is huge!

The food is divine and you are spoilt for choice!

The service experience is second to none and everyone is friendly and helpful.

With a stunning location, luxurious accommodation, outstanding service, and delicious dining options, I have no hesitation in recommending Jetwing Lighthouse -  where luxury and service is always timeless.
title: The Best Hospitality Experience in the South of Sri Lanka...

placeInfo: {'id': '302888', 'name': 'Jetwing Lighthouse', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 2711, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.042279, 'longitude': 80.19482, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d302888-Reviews-Jetwing_Lighthouse-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwinglighthouse/', 'address': '433 A Dadella, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '433 A Dadella', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 54, 'count2': 52, 'count3': 203, 'count4': 651, 'count5': 1753}}
roomTip: Almost everything is right here.
text:
Our family has stayed at the Lighthouse Hotel in Galle a couple of times. In our latest visit we stayed in a superior suite to which we were upgraded from the IBAN Bathutha suite. Even though both may be comparable in many ways the superior suite is newer and has a plunge pool in addition to the Jacuzzi tub in the spacious bathroom. The bed is very comfortable allowing a good night's sleep. The pantry and sitting area are very well furnished. Chairs of different types are all equally comfy. Both balconies have additional seating. The lobby area has a great Sony TV with Netflix and YouTube accessible with the remote. The bedroom also has a TV though not as good. Central air-conditioning is very good. Wi-Fi is fine. It's very admirable that there's a book cabinet in the lobby with some interesting copies of relevant books. You might wonder how big the suite has to be to accommodate all these and more... Yes, it's really big - as big as a small to medium sized apartment in a condominium. I guess the surface area is about 1500 sqft. We were provided with an unlimited supply of bottled (glass) drinking water. 
The buffets were great as we would have experienced at many Jetwing hotels. Jetwing is one of our favorite hotel chains in Sri Lanka. We have stayed in up to about 10 of them so far with no regrets and only with happy 😁 memories. 
The view of the rugged beach below from the room is breathtaking. In the carpark in front of the hotel there's only just enough parking lots. Yet, it's rarely a problem since there's a large carpark opposite the hotel just on the land side of Galle-Colombo road. 
Despite its age the hotel is very well maintained with well kept lawns and gardens. It's always a pleasure to visit/stay in this fabulous 5 ⭐ hotel.
title: Gem of Galle

text: We went in June and the ocean was very angry but watching the waves by the beach was an amazing experience and we love to do that especiallyat breakfast and dinner. The staff was very helpful and friendly, the restaurant staff especially was very very hospitable and attentive. We wish we stay there longer. PickMe around the area was ok to use just need to wait aboutt 5-10 mins on some days. Galle old town was a must and so close to the hotel, we enjoyed the walk very much!! Spa was a bit expensive but it was a bit hard to book and it was standard, nothing special, however they are all very nice. Looking forward to stay there again!!
title: WONDERFUL STAY AS A COUPLE

text:
Absolutely smashing experience at the Radisson Blu Galle. The staff was so courteous and accommodating and generous in their approach. The property is right on the beach and has a great pool, some fabulous restaurants and a cozy kids club to keep the little ones busy. We were a family of 10 people between the ages of 10-75 and everyone had a fabulous time at the hotel. 
Special mention for the housekeeping staff member who found my lost earring and deposited it in the lost and found department where I got it back. I had just bought the green amethyst earrings that day and was so relieved to have it back in my hands.
title: Calm and rejuvenating experience

text:
My wife and I spent two amazing weeks at this hotel for our honeymoon, and we couldn't have chosen a better place. The hotel is incredibly clean and well-maintained, with every detail taken care of. The staff went above and beyond to make sure we had the best experience, providing top-tier service throughout our stay.

The food was simply outstanding! There was a wide variety of dishes to choose from every day, and everything we tried was absolutely delicious. Whether you're a fan of local flavors or prefer international cuisine, the options are endless.

We would like to give special thanks to Madurang, Sanjika, Ravish & Chandimal for the delicious drinks they prepared for us. Huge appreciation also to the head chefs Seenaka and Kapila for their amazing culinary creations. Lastly, we’d like to thank Dilan, Prasad and Madura for their excellent service, which made us feel truly welcome. Thanks also to all of the staff not mentioned by name.

One of the highlights of our stay was a stunning, romantic dinner on the beach, organized by the hotel as a beautiful way to end our honeymoon. It was such a thoughtful touch that made our experience even more special.

We highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a relaxing and luxurious stay. Whether it’s for a honeymoon or a regular getaway, you won’t be disappointed!
title: Truly amazing stay!

placeInfo: {'id': '10954536', 'name': 'Radisson Blu Resort, Galle', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 2458, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.052548, 'longitude': 80.18139, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d10954536-Reviews-Radisson_Blu_Resort_Galle-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.radissonhotels.com/de-de/hotels/radisson-blu-galle?cid=a:se+b:yex+c:apac+i:local+e:rdb+d:seap+f:de-de+h:lkcmbgal', 'address': '523C Colombo Road, Galle 80280 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '523C Colombo Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80280'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 64, 'count2': 61, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 490, 'count5': 1685}}
text:
I arrived in Galle and at this hotel with quite high expectations and thought this would be something like a Phuket (Thailand) or Ayia Napa (Cyprus). Unfortunately, the town of Galle, including its historic fort with some tourist shops and restaurants, I felt was relatively mediocre, nothing special, I would skip this on my next Sri Lanka trip and focus on the country's amazing national parks and hikes. 

The hotel is (I believe) being advertised as 5-star, which, by international standards, is definitely misleading, causing some initial disappointment on my end. But the reception staff, particularly Ms Shanika, were super helpful and provided me with a great suite overlooking the ocean, even containing a big, free standing bath tub and rain shower, which I both used. Now this is something, thank you for this!

Dinner buffet is absolutely delicious, the pasta is freshly made and prepared, and for a minute, I felt I was in Italy: super quality, super tasty, just really really good (... and I eat pasta 7 days a week at home). The fusion buffet offers Sri Lankan, Indian, Italian, and Western BBQ options, with lots of salads and dessert options. The retaurant staff was also very friendly and helpful.

There is a rooftop bar with DJ, pool table, and a big bar, overlooking the pool area (see image). A nice way to finish your day with a couple of drinks or cold beers, meet other foreign tourists, and plan your next day.

In sum: a good hotel that I would use again, with helpful staff!
title: Nice hotel in a mediocre beach town - solid international standard

ownerResponse:
{'id': '973425850', 'text': 'Dear Naimish,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your recent stay with us. We sincerely appreciate your kind words for Dixon, Chef Satish, Malakah, Vikash, and the entire restaurant team. We are proud to have such dedicated staff, and it’s wonderful to hear that they made a positive impact on your experience.

However, I am truly sorry to learn that other aspects of your stay did not meet your expectations. Please accept our sincere apologies for the challenges you faced with the room maintenance, particularly with the TV, bathroom, and shower fixtures, as well as the delayed response from housekeeping. This is certainly not the standard of service we strive for, and we addressed these issues with our team during your stay, following your feedback.

Your concern regarding the breakfast situation is deeply troubling, and we take any mention of discriminatory behavior very seriously. I personally conducted an inquiry and would like to clarify that the chef was following standard procedures to maintain food hygiene. While we do allow guests to have food delivered to their rooms through room service upon certain request, carrying food directly from the buffet to the room is not permitted to ensure adherence to our brand standards and food safety practices. I wanted to clarify this to prevent any misunderstandings that may leave a negative impression on future readers. Please be assured that we are committed to providing a fair and welcoming environment for all guests, regardless of nationality.

I also regret the lack of hospitality you experienced at reception regarding your request for detox water. This does not reflect the high level of service we aim to provide, and we will ensure our staff are reminded of the importance of attentive and respectful guest care.
Once again, thank you for your valuable feedback. We will use it to make necessary improvements, ensuring that future guests enjoy a more consistent and positive experience. We sincerely hope you will consider giving us another opportunity to provide you with the stay you deserve.

Warm regards,

Angelo Mendis
General Manager

text: Well stayed here 2 nights with my family.  We were looking forward to staying in galle and heard very good things about the hotel.  However a major disappointment. First let me give a big note of appreciation to dixon at the hotel.  A wonderful human being and extremely customer centric and guest friendly.  The hotel needs 20 more people like dixon.  A big shoutout to chef Satish and entire restaurant team.  Malakah and then trainee vikash and so many others.  All very good and kind people.  Big thumbs up.    Now the reality of the hotel.  I would not give this more than a 3 star Rating.  We checked in the tv had a black line running across it.  The bathroom was overflowing when we took a shower.  Shower fixtures were broken.  Basically housekeeping is a big big let down.  Last day the toilet was clogged and we had to call twice and even then after 30mins only they came.  Extremely disappointing.  Also a matter of serious concern which I did highlight to dixon.  There was inherent racism from the sri lankan chef, small guy with a goatee.  When we were leaving with some food from breakfast they told us you cannot take food out which is fair enough.  However in front of us 2 people from Europe or Poland filled the boxes and took it with them in front of us and the chef said nothing.  We were Indians with 3 rooms and we were stopped the people from.europe nothing.  Please understand that this is implied racism and not relevant in today's world and not especially sri lanka.  Last day at the hotel I called the front desk and asked them to fill up the detox water for us for the trip.  The lady at reception told me you can fill it yourself.  These things are not 5 star property values more like a very average 3 star hotel.  Mr.Dixon was actually the saviour for the hotel as well as restaurnt staff, however everything else is very substandard.  A very big letdown for sure.
title: A poor stay

text:
Initially I was apprehensive while booking this hotel as I checked on trip advisor and this hotel has mixed reviews but coming from bentota region to galle this was one of the best properties in galle with all the rooms with beach view.
We had booked a Junior Suite with ocean view and let me tell you the room size was huge with a large balcony looking over to a ocean front 
Let me put a detailed review below 
1. Firstly on our arrival they treated us with chilled hand towels and very delicious apple juice. We had reached around 2, where in we were shown our room within 5 mins of our arrival . Shanika at the front desk facilitated everything so calmly yet quickly. 
2. Their room service is prompt and sanitisation was good 
3. The in room standard amenities were top notch with a coffee maker installed 
4. The USP of this hotel is its Kids Club which made it soo easy for us with our 5 year old they had a scheduled class every evening my son did a cookie making and pizza making class which engaged him atleast 2 hours a day which gave us the breather. Especially to mention Sandu from the kids club is an extremely pleasant personality, me and my son felt extremely warm around her.
5. The hotel has a very catch roof top bar which has a beach view apt for a night club vibe at the beach 
6. The hotel also has a very big pool and kids pool separate which makes it wonderful for the kids to enjoy with different pool toys. There’s another bar at the pool near to the beach which has some delicious cocktails and mocktails. Must try their passion fruit lemonade.
7. Let’s come to the food now, the hotel has a nice multi cuisine restaurant, along with an Italian restaurant. You can opt for their package with meal inclusive as all the meals were very good 
8. The breakfast buffet had a variety of Indian, continental, Chinese, global cuisine alongside some options for gluten free and vegan food as well. Special thanks to the chef Seneka, he personally visited us and modified few dishes to our likings, not to forget these guys have my favourite Gulab Jaamun as desert for lunch which was too good.
Overall this was one of the best stays soo far I can’t complain.
title: Don’t fall for bad reviews this is genuinely the best hotel in galle

roomTip: Just relax. Everything can be arranged
text:
One of the best Hotels I have visited hands down. From the moment of making the booking until we checked out the experience has been fantastic. The staff headed by Mr Angelo - GM and the dining staff headed by Chef Kapila , with Chef Asanka and the team makes sure you enjoy your stay to the fullest, whether you are a couple or a family.
A special mention should go to the dining experience. All the meals are meticulous planned with a wide range of different food items and all of them are so well prepared and presented and delicious. Every meal we enjoyed was really satisfying and tasty. Miss Saumya and the team at the restaurant made us so welcome that we felt like we are in a family gathering , rather than a hotel. 
The rooms are cosy and offers a generous view of the Indian ocean. The amenities are well thought out and ample. The staff is always attentive and a simply a call away.
I highly recommend Raddison Blu for your next holiday.  
- Thank you team Raddison Blue -
title: A fantastic getaway

placeInfo: {'id': '10954536', 'name': 'Radisson Blu Resort, Galle', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 2458, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.052548, 'longitude': 80.18139, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d10954536-Reviews-Radisson_Blu_Resort_Galle-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.radissonhotels.com/de-de/hotels/radisson-blu-galle?cid=a:se+b:yex+c:apac+i:local+e:rdb+d:seap+f:de-de+h:lkcmbgal', 'address': '523C Colombo Road, Galle 80280 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '523C Colombo Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80280'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 64, 'count2': 61, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 490, 'count5': 1685}}
roomTip: You may like to ensure that room is not having any moisture issues, otherwise it is a great place to enjoy
text:
Our visit to the beach city of Galle came with big expectations, and we were not disappointed by the city’s charm. Galle is a must-visit for anyone traveling to Sri Lanka, with its rich history, European architecture, and recognition as a UNESCO World Heritage site. The golden sandy beaches and the breathtaking ocean views are a major attraction for every tourist, and we were excited to explore this iconic destination.

Upon arriving at the Radisson Blu Resort, our check-in experience was smooth and welcoming, and we were looking forward to a relaxing stay. However, our first night took an unexpected turn. We were assigned to room 3501 in Tower 3, which unfortunately became a bit of a spoiler as the evening progressed. The room’s floor started becoming wet with moisture, which we were told was due to the proximity to the sea. While we’ve stayed at many beachfront hotels in Sri Lanka, this was a new and unusual experience for us. Nonetheless, the hotel staff responded quickly, sending housekeeping at 11 pm to wipe the floors. Though we were able to sleep, the issue persisted, and later in the night, we noticed moisture dripping from the ceiling.

The next morning, we reported the issue to the reception, and we were pleased with how promptly the staff acted. They quickly moved us to a room in Tower 2, and from that point onward, our stay was much more comfortable. The room had the same stunning sea view, and the environment was much more pleasant. Every room at the Radisson Blu offers a magnificent ocean view, and the hotel overall is well-maintained and aesthetically pleasing.

Although the hotel next door played music late into the night, we didn’t mind. It added to the lively atmosphere, and we ended up enjoying the fun vibe.

A special mention must go to the head chef, Mr. Sennaka, who was exceptionally friendly and took the time to inquire about our food preferences. While the breakfast spread was relatively basic, it was good, and the dinner was elaborate and delicious. The attention to detail in the dinner menu really elevated our dining experience.

The location of the Radisson Blu is another significant plus point. The resort sits right on the beach, and while the sea can be rocky and roaring, it’s a beautiful spot for a relaxing walk along the shore. Additionally, the hotel is conveniently located close to the Galle market and the historic Galle Fort, making it easy to explore the city.

We also want to express our gratitude to Satish Singh, Diljan, and Soumya for their exceptional hospitality. Their kindness, smiles, and attentiveness made a big difference and ensured that we were well taken care of during our stay.

Although our first night wasn’t ideal due to the moisture issue in the room, the Radisson Blu staff made up for it with their prompt response and warm hospitality. What they may have lacked initially, they more than made up for with their dedication to ensuring our comfort. In the end, our stay at Radisson Blu was fantastic, and we left with great memories of Galle. We would definitely consider returning in the future.
title: A Memorable Stay at Radisson Blu Resort, Galle- With a Bumps Aling the way

text:
My recent stay at the Galle Radisson Blu was, in no small part, superb, and it is due to the great service accorded me by a member of its front office staff, Mr Ashan. The warm reception since my arrival set a precedence that turned out to be an excellent stay.

Mr. Ashan went all the way to ensure that each of my requests was dealt with immediately, and in great detail. His friendly demeanor, very helpful recommendations, and genuine care taken with guests made me feel valued throughout my stay.

Further, if anyone is looking for a place where hospitality shines, I highly recommend the Radisson Blu, Galle..
title: Outstanding Service at Radisson Blu, Galle

We had a final meeting at The Raddison Blu Hotel Galle after an inspection Tour in the Regeon.
After the meeting we came to know that they have a Indian Food Promotion and we decided to enjoy the Indian Cuisine.
As we enter the Restaurant we felt that we are entering to an Tipical Indian Restaurant in Indian Capital City.
It was well organized and two Indian Chefs were flowne from India.
Welcome and greeting was excellent. We had great Cuisine.
True Indian Music made guest to enjoy more.
We met the Executive Chef Senaka and experienced some of the Chefs were moving around and refiling the buffet and helping the customer about the dishess.
At the end we all had a great evening and wonderful dining experience. 
I would like to recommend this Great Beach Hotel for anyone who like to stay in Galle.
Big Thanks to Chef Senaka and his team as well as the Service team who gave us an excellent experience.
title: Fantastic People and Excellent Food and Venu.

text:
If you are searching for an exceptional place to stay in the southern region, Radisson Blu is highly recommended. The hotel offers a seamless blend of comfort, luxury, and world-class hospitality. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, the well-appointed rooms, top-tier amenities, and excellent service make it an ideal choice.

The location is perfect for exploring nearby attractions while enjoying tranquility and modern conveniences. The staff are attentive and go out of their way to ensure guests have an outstanding experience. The dining options are diverse, offering both local and international cuisine that will satisfy any palate.

The hotel also boasts excellent facilities, including a pool, spa, and fitness center, which add to the relaxing and rejuvenating atmosphere. Its attention to detail and commitment to guest satisfaction make Radisson Blu in the south an unbeatable destination. Highly recommended for an unforgettable stay!

text:
Reasonable hotel outside Galle. 
The hotel is a little worn. But with a nice location right on the beach . 

Food is above average

Staff is very friendly. 

We had some problem in the room with aircon - it made the room very damp. But after we complained - they gave us another room so that was good service

The best think in the hotel is the Spa. They have very good staff and reasonable prices. The roof top bar is also a good place
title: Average hotel a bit outside Galle

text:
We stayed here for one night recently and it was perfect. From the moment we came in the staff was attentive including the securities, thanks Inura and Sammani help us for the easy check in and check out. Supervisor Dhanush and team also well-arranged our rooms.
We were assisted by the person named Guest Relations officer Ashan throughout our stay and he made sure everything was smooth.
Rooms were comfortable and cozy.
Breakfast was excellent.
Lunch and dinner mains the variety was great and more selection even though the hotel was fully booked. However, the staff at the restaurant was friendly and efficient. They did an excellent job.
title: Exceed The Expectations

text:
One of the worst hotel experiences we have had in a long time. 

Worst hospitality by most staff. Air of racism by the arrogant staff giving AC dining to foreigners and outside for locals (we certainly felt an air of racism) the Fans outside the dining area were broken and we were boiling. When we asked for a baby chair and positioned it next to the baby’s mother, the staff asked to move it cos it was blocking the walking path even though there was plenty of walking space left. Just surprising to get such terrible terrible service after paying full price! 

Food was terrible and bland. Good spread, but overall bland.  But pool was good, nice and warm. 

Given so many other options in southern coast, we will not be heading back here.
title: One of the worst hotels in southern coast

text:
Beautiful hotel located by the ocean, all rooms with a beautiful view. Lovely pool. Only problem is not being able to keep skiing door to balcony open due to humidity, ocean spray. Delicious buffets & lovely roof top bar.
Lovely staff, I chatted with Lahiru, one of the many friendly hard working staff!
title: Lovely hotel in a beautiful location by the ocean. Great pool & friendly helpful staff. Good ambience & beautiful views

roomTip: It is easy to get a Tuk tuk to the Old Fort area ( 7km away ) where there are some lovely shops and interesting historical buildings
text:
As part of a group tour we stayed 3 nights at this large but lovely hotel right on the beachfront at Galle. The staff were friendly and helpful, special thank you to good service from Lahiru, 
The hotel has a beautiful big pool and dining area on the ground floor a rooftop bar where you can also order food. 
The buffet breakfast offers a good selection but other good we had was average. 
The rooms all have a beautiful outlook over the pool to the ocean and are very comfortable with a balcony. 
I also used the Spa facility for a massage and it was excellent. I would recommend this hotel for groups or couples or families.
title: Beautiful hotel right on the beach

placeInfo: {'id': '10954536', 'name': 'Radisson Blu Resort, Galle', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 2458, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.052548, 'longitude': 80.18139, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d10954536-Reviews-Radisson_Blu_Resort_Galle-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.radissonhotels.com/de-de/hotels/radisson-blu-galle?cid=a:se+b:yex+c:apac+i:local+e:rdb+d:seap+f:de-de+h:lkcmbgal', 'address': '523C Colombo Road, Galle 80280 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '523C Colombo Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80280'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 64, 'count2': 61, 'count3': 161, 'count4': 490, 'count5': 1685}}
text:
The 6-day stay at the Raddison Blue Galle was easily the highlight of our month-long visit to Sri Lanka in July/August 2024. The Radisson Blue boasts of all amenities one would expect from a good five-star hotel. Its location is magical, with a beautiful stretch of beach devoid of hassle. The rooms are spacious, and the food is designed to cater for every palate. The swimming pool is clean and well served by the poolside bar. The rooftop night club offers a good selection of snacks, drinks and entertainment. All this would make Radisson Blu Galle a place worth visiting.

However, what makes it truly exceptional is its staff who personify the very best of the legendary Sri Lankan hospitality. Superbly led by its very affable General Manager Angelo, the team is filled with amazingly friendly individuals who make it their mission to make every guest feel special. A few deserve even further acknowledgement, as they are simple the best – Nuwan, Navindu, Dhakshina and Janith make the restaurant the friendliest place to meet, Nimesha is a master of Room Service, Sangika, Chandimal are mixologists beyond compare, Gayan and Shantha keep the poolside safe. The catering team led by the outstanding chefs Kapila Kodituwakku and Asanka Manoj offer mouthwatering creations on a daily basis. If a tuk tuk ride is needed, Vajira will make it a safe and fulfilling experience. I can only thank all of them for creating some of my best memories ever! Bohoma Isthoothyi
title: Simply the best

roomTip: We had a great regular Tuk Tuk driver that took us around the local area and sites. Great way to get around.
text: Great stay at the Radison Blu Resort. We spent 10 nights at the hotel and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The room was a junior suite  and was ideal, very spacious, we didn't have a seaview as such but had a large window facing the pool area and sea and a balcony with the same. The food was excellent for our entire stay with a variety of local and  european dishes on the buffet. There were also excellent cook to order stations and the desserts were outstanding ( especially the chocolate mouse). The staff were extremely good and attentive at the restaurant and bars and the grounds were kept in immaculate condition. Some of the staff who really made our stay so enjoyable were Nimesha, Saumya and Prasad in the restraurant and Maduranga and Ravish in the bars. The managers and the exec chef, Seeneka, always toured the restaurants and bars and ensured we were well looked after. A really great stay.
title: Great stay

text:

We enjoyed our 3 day stay very much , the room was spacious, comfortable beds, plenty of lighting , bathroom had a lovely rain fall shower, could not fault anything in this hotel, its in middle of all the main attractions, plenty of shops and things to see, the staff are exceptional, very friendly, will go out of their way to assist with any thing to make your stay enjoyable, thank you to  Ameen , 
Lankanath
Avindu, 
Mohammed Rizwan   & 
Naveena , you really made our stay memorable,
This hotel has a really lovely restaurant with fantastic food, the breakfast is really good. Highly recommend hotel, 
Best hotel I have stayed in .
title: Unforgettable experience

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text:
I had the pleasure of visiting The Merchant in Galle Fort twice now, and each time has been a delight! 😍 The place offers a calm and peaceful atmosphere, making it a perfect spot to relax and unwind. The ambiance is so fresh and breathable, giving you the space to just sit back and enjoy your meal 🍃✨.

The staff? Absolutely wonderful! They are super friendly and attentive, which just adds to the overall positive vibe of the place 😊. Now, let’s talk about the food – top-notch in every sense! Every dish I’ve tried so far has been incredible. My favorite drink? Definitely the Blue Curacao Mojito 🍸, refreshing and just the right amount of sweet. The Passion Fruit Juice 🥤 is also a great pick, full of flavor and freshness.

For food, we sampled the Chicken Wings 🍗, Cheese Pasta 🧀🍝, and Potato Chips 🍟 – all served beautifully and bursting with taste. The flavors are rich, and each dish feels carefully crafted. And don’t even get me started on their cheesecakes! 🍰 We tried them in multiple flavors, and they were all heavenly.

I’m already looking forward to my next visit when I’m in Galle Fort again. Truly, the calm and serene atmosphere is what makes The Merchant stand out. Loved every moment there! 🌿❤️
title: A Gem in Galle Fort: The Merchant

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text: This is a lovely hotel with great character right in the centre of Galle Fort.  We were greeted by the very friendly and helpful staff and checked in quickly.  The room was perfect for the 3 of us and very comfortable.  There is no lift in the hotel and the stairs are quite steep which didn't bother us but if you have mobility issues could be a problem.  We stayed for 2 night and ate in the restaurant for breakfast and dinner.  The food was served rather than buffet which was a pleasant change and was plentiful and very good.  We found the staff here really nice, friendly and helpful.  The location of the hotel is great for exploring being right in the centre of Galle Fort.  The walk around the walls late in the evening was fantastic with loads of young school kids on tours adding to the atmosphere.  We would highly recommend this hotel.
title: Lovely hotel with great character and location

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
roomTip: Just make sure you don’t fall into the trap of staying at a chain hotel, a boutique hotel like this one is well worth it!
text:
We were due to stay at a leading 4* hotel chain in Galle but when we checked in we were disappointed so quickly had to find an alternative.

Luckily, we found rooms on Booking.com at this property and quickly booked, and wow, what a tremendous hotel.

Upon arrival and throughout the service was spectacular, nothing was too much trouble. 

The room was beautifully decorated with everything you could need for a short or long stay, they have worked hard to keep a colonial feel without compromising on modern amenities, and they do it so well!

The food both at the bar, restaurant and room service were extraordinary, some of the best cuisine I’ve had in Sri Lanka - would definitely recommend the Biriani for dinner, or the tuna steak for lunch.

Cocktails and juices were very well made, and unique in taste, again some of the best in Sri Lanka.

The breakfast was very tasty, with a full range of options to suit all, without compromising on quality.

Thank you to all the staff, and to the owners -
Keep doing what you’re doing, as you do it so well!

See you again!
title: One of the best hotels in Sri Lanka! 5*
