placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text:
The Merchant in Galle Fort is a stunning boutique hotel that perfectly blends modern luxury with charming architecture. Located on the vibrant Peddler Street, the hotel boasts spacious and well-maintained rooms, ensuring a comfortable stay for guests.
The in-house restaurant, 1710, offers a delightful array of culinary options, making dining a pleasure. Breakfast is made to order and features both western and Sri Lankan options that are extremely tasty.
The exceptional service provided by the staff truly sets this hotel apart. From the moment we arrived, we were welcomed with genuine Sri Lankan hospitality. A big shoutout to Shakila, Samith, Ameen, and Indika for making our stay a very memorable one.
With its prime location in the heart of Galle Fort, guests can easily explore the area's rich history and vibrant culture. The Merchant is an ideal base for families and friends alike, offering a memorable stay with fantastic food and attentive service. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Galle.
title: World class service and a beautiful hotel in the heart of Galle!

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
roomTip: Compared to the rest of Sri Lanka, Galle is expensive - expect UK prices everywhere you go.
text:
Superb town hotel which has been beautifully and tastefully developed and is perfectly located to enjoy the Galle experience.

The rooms are immaculate and beautifully appointed - they have even thought to provide mosquito repellent in the form of a body lotion!  Beds are incredibly comfortable.

This was the last hotel on our Sri Lanka tour and the service was comfortably on a par with the best we experienced throughout our tour.  Thanks to Amaan who gave us our wake up call and helped with cases at an ungodly hour...

We ate dinner in the hotel and the food was superb.  Both Sri Lankan and Western dishes were perfectly cooked (try the locally caught white bait) and whilst the restaurant was busy, the atmosphere was relaxed and enjoyable.  Would have been nice to have had more time between starters/mains but that's a minor quibble.

Thank you Merchant Galle and thank you Sri Lanka - simply the most wonderful country and people.
title: In the heart of Fort Galle

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
roomTip: If there aren't enough vegetarian or vegan options on the menu - just ask! The kitchen team have amazing dishes they can swap out!!!
text: Thanks so much to Shakila for taking such good care of us and going above and beyond to make our stay special. The Merchant is a breathtakingly beautiful old building lovingly restored and thoughtfully furnished - each piece is a beautiful piece of woodwork in Galle style. The room is very comfortable and beautifully appointed with a balcony overlooking treetops and street action. Slept like a baby in this decadent bed. All the food and drinks are exquisite from the complimentary welcome drinks to the sumptuous breakfast!!! The kitchen team were super nice about doing vegetarian and vegan options whenever we asked and the mushroom breakfast curry was incredible!!! Outstanding location too - right in the centre of town - an easy and gorgeous walk to absolutely anywhere in Galle Fort!! Can't recommend this place enough!!!
title: Everything was perfect

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text:
We had a wonderful and very comfortable stay at the Merchant ! We enjoyed the location of the hotel at the heart of Galle Fort, which enabled us to go for a walk very easily and discover the world heritage site and its surroundings. We loved the Merchant’s generous and delicious breakfast, stylish room and above all, the kindness and friendliness of the staff. 
A big up 👍 to Navina and Shakila in charge of guest relations, Samith, rooms division manager and general management dedicated to taking extra care of their customers ! Thank you for making our stay a very pleasant experience 🙏
Vanessa and Grégory
title: Lovely stay in the ideally located boutique hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text:
I'm very happy with my choice to stay at this hotel.

The staff were very attentive. While there was no turndown service despite it being our first wedding anniversary, it was not a major issue.

The room was clean, though the staff overlooked our teacups from the previous night. The manager promptly addressed this, although it was odd that he had to check the room to verify my claim.

The toilet was clean, which is very important to me.

We slept well on our first night. Their superior king room was spacious enough. The air conditioning was a bit too blowy, but manageable.

There is a jewelry shop in the lobby called Ayuda. The waiter convinced us to check it out, and we ended up buying some loose stones. However, I highly suggest checking out Aida Gems first on Peddler's Road as well so you can compare. They have a wider selection of loose stones at about a quarter of the price compared to Ayuda, same cuts and clarity though I did manage to bargain at Ayuda. 😄
title: We’re quite happy with our stay!😊

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
roomTip: Talk to the GM, Samith directly.
text: Coming to Mer.chant is like coming home. This is our hideout in Galle Rampart. I always feel well-rested and aligned after my stay. For a small boutique hotel, their attention to detail is impeccable. The service staff is very friendly and exudes Galle charm, and the General Manager, Samith, is a gem of a professional who swiftly ensured all our needs were met. This is my third stay, and I hope Mer.chant will retain its charm until I come back next time.
title: Coming to Merchant is like coming home. 💖

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text: This is a hotel-restaurant in the center of Galle. The setting is very nice, U-shaped building with restaurant in the garden in the middle. In the evening, very cozy lighting inname the trees. After 3 weeks of cheap spots in Sri Lanka, the prices here were more ‘European’ level. That’s why we had mocktails iso cocktails, but they were delicious. The food was also very nice.
title: Lovely space restaurant at Galle fort center

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text:
We stayed one night in Galle but we enjoyed it very much. Location is perfect and the rooms are big and clean and the bathroom is particularly nice. 
The staff is very friendly and the opportunity to get a smoothie at your own choice at check-in was a winner. We had a pick-up before the breakfast restaurant opened but they arranged for us to pre-order and opening 1/2h early. Thats service :-)
title: The place to stay in Galle

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
roomTip: Galle is host to so many beautiful coastal views and cultural heritage- get out and explore!
text:
I wish I could heap praise upon this place as in many ways it’s trying so hard, and on paper it ticks a lot of the right boxes, but I feel its grasp is beyond its reach. 

Hotel, restaurant, jewellers… hard to be all things to all people. The staff are amazingly hospitable, friendly, courteous, attentive and especially warm towards our little boy (a few months shy of being 2yo).

Our check in was great and efficient. We had lunch straight away and my squid as well as calamari was over cooked and rubbery. Service at breakfast was slow despite being the only guests present for breakfast at the time we were there, you only get one coffee/tea. Our room was right next door to a loud generator outside, with balcony doors that don’t shut properly/tightly so the sound (and hot air) flow in. The aircon was loud and didn’t seem to make much difference.

It’s still a nice place, but it could be so much more. I want it to do and be better for its own sake. Right now, as an establishment, the total is somehow less than the sum of its parts.
title: Good, but could be so much better

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text:
We had lunch at The Merchant. We had Calamari, Margarita pizza and fish ambuthayal pizza. Calamari was very good. Margarita pizza also was good. Fish ambuthayal however had a weird taste.
Pretty decent lunch at a nice upscale restaurant. Good place for lunch
title: Good lunch

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text: I love this place and miss it in the same moment when I left. So beautiful calm place. The food are amazing the staff so lovely and the rooms so modern feel home directly. I wish I come back to here to enjoy again. This place I spend the longest staying in the whole time traveling around sri lanka
title: The best place in galle fort

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text:
Went to the merchant for lunch and have to say it was amongst the best meals we had on our trip.
The restaurant in itself is very nicely decorated.
Can’t say enough about the food- it was superb.
Ordered the thali and a prawn curry..
Kids had a pizza and chocolate shakes..
We literally inhaled it it was that good.
Seems to be a hotel.. also a little jewellery shop inside the premises and lots of shops outside.
Definitely would visit again

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text: Lovely staff at the Merchant hotel - they were extremely attentive and kindly let me know I made a double booking and gave me a free cancellation. The room itself was clean and in pristine condition. The breakfast was also incredible with fresh fruit daily and local Sri Lankan options.
title: Amazing stay right in the heart of Galle fort

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text:
Located right in the heart of the Galle Fort surrounding by restaurant little boutique shops which was lovely.
Mind you that there’s no elevator and my room was on 2/F
Air con was a little noisy but I was dead tired didn’t bother to report
One thing one of the reviewer mentioned below as well was that, they are so stingy in terms of offering water. Called to the reception asking for an extra bottle and was turned down, they only provide 2 per day. Literally asking you get your own or to pay for extra, which isn’t nice considering Sri Lanka overall is humid and hot, plus the rate isn’t cheap at all (around USD170 per night)
title: Great location

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}

Its in galle fort 
Close to everything
text:
The best hotel you can visit in galle 
 food was fantastic 
The rooms are very clean and tidy also the facilities were new 
We had an amazing stay there i would totaly recommend.

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
roomTip: PickMe from the station quote one a price, you book it, they then phone to negotiate, it’s all cheap 250 but they charge what they can!
text:
Comfortable hotel, good bed, bedding and towels 

They served a good breakfast a la carte, good variety both international and local 

Lovely service from all the staff, front desk, restaurant and room service 

There were only two queries 

1. Only mirror was in the bathroom, not one in the bedroom, there was no plug in the bathroom so for my wife difficult for hair dryer 
2. We asked for a glass of water at breakfast, that was chargeable which we thought was odd for a 4 star hotel
title: Lovely central stay

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text:
This place is fabulous.  

The rooms are great - all the facilities you need.

The location is perfect - right in the centre of Galle Fort. 

Finally, the people are absolutely wonderful, particularly Shakila and Ameen.  They are so helpful and wonderful! Just great people who clearly love their job.
title: The perfect place to stay in Galle Fort

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
roomTip: Morning refreshments were excellent
text: Popped in here during a hot morning stroll around the fort area for some rest and refreshments.  The outdoor seating area was so comfortable and the staff were friendly and attentive. We would recommend the Iced Tea with passion fruit which was delicious.  Especial mention to the bar staff member, Ishmael, who was attentive and friendly chatting to us and ensuring we had a fan to cool us down. A very pleasant oasis in the wonderful Galle Fort.
title: Cool oasis

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text:
We had beautiful room on the top floor with a high ceiling and a balcony. The bathroom and the shower were excellent.
Very good brealkfast served in a shady yard outside. No buffet!
The service was great, especially Shakila made us feel very welcome and at home. Thank you very much!
title: First rate hotel just a few steps from every sight

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text:
One of the nicest hotels in Galle Fort with spacious rooms (which can be hard to come by in Galle Fort). I really liked the modern interior and the delicious food, the breakfast a la carte menu is worth every cent, given how expensive most places are in the area. 

The staff were great! Shakila at reception was very welcoming and gave us tours around the different room types before checking in.
title: Beautiful modern interior with spacious rooma

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text:
This is an excellent hotel inside the gall fort. Access to many interesting attractions within a few minutes. 

The hotel accommodation was really good, with modern amenities and a cosy environment, The restaurant offers a variety of local and international menus to suit your preferences. 

The staff was helpful and attentive to guest needs, and the overall property was well maintained and kept attractive.
title: Good experience with central location in historic Gall Fort.

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
roomTip: Mornings are quietest around the old town, it gets very busy as the day progresses
text:
A lovely hotel in a great location for exploring Galle Fort on foot.
The staff are extremely helpful and knowledgeable and go out of their way to make you feel welcome at all times during your stay. Special mention for Ameel for making us feel at home!
The courtyard is a great spot for a meal or a drink. Our stay was very relaxing.
title: Lovely hotel, great location

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text:
We reserved a one-night stay at the hotel. Upon arrival, we were warmly welcomed by the staff and decided to extend our stay to two nights due to the pleasant ambiance and beautiful vibe of the hotel. We were thoroughly impressed with the cleanliness and spaciousness of the family rooms, which provided a relaxing environment.

We commend the exceptional customer service and professionalism demonstrated by each staff member. In particular, Chamika Wickramanayaka, the General Manager, and Ameen from the front office, stood out for their outstanding service. Additionally, Rizwan from the Food and Beverage department provided excellent service.

Based on our positive experience, we will undoubtedly return to this hotel and highly recommend it to our associates and friends. The quality of the food was significantly superior to other establishments we visited during our stay.
title: The best part of our stay in Galle

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text: We came here after “the usual” circuit of Negombo, Kandy, Ella, Udalawale, Weligama etc. and found this gem of a hotel. We loved our stay. Super clean rooms, wonderful staff, perfect t location, excellent service and food. Stay at The Merchant. You’ll love it. Thanks to the team for having made our short stay with four kids very memorable. Secret tip: ask the hotel for Nelum’s number, a great local guide who’ll take you around Galle.
title: Excellent. Stay at The Merchant if you can

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text: We were in the restaurant twice in January 2024. Once for an extensive breakfast and once for dinner. Both times we left the restaurant full and satisfied. In the evening there is a beautiful ambience with harmonious lighting. The staff were very friendly and attentive. We also felt very welcome with our toddler. We all enjoyed the food very much. It was simply a nice visit twice.
title: Ideal for Breakfast and Dinner

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
roomTip: Small but well laid out rooms
text:
The rooms are small but well thought out. The air conditioning is brilliant.
Staff were excellent and always obliging. There are steps to the rooms so anyone with mobility issues could have a problem.
Shakila in reception was particularly helpful and considerate.
title: Three nights in Galle

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
roomTip: The hotel will arrange all your trips and give you all the help and information you need ..
text: Absolutely fantastic!! My first visit to Sri Lanka and I will definitely be back, I found the merchant hotel in Galle Fort by accident, but what a beautiful and friendly hotel!! Everyone is so helpful and smiling, the location is perfect, on one of the main streets but very quiet and relaxing, the food was amazing, my bed was so comfortable, the room was spotless and the shower roomy and powerful… I’ll definitely be back here
title: What a find ! Hotel merchant is a must !

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
roomTip:
We found 3 nights in Galle to much for us. Once we'd walked around the shops which some
hav extravagant prices there
not a lot else to do.
text:
Great position in Galle Fort. The room was good, bed was very comfy, and it had great aircon. Breakfast and evening meals were very good, with a good selection. Sadly due to it being in a heritage site it hasn't got a pool.
We found the management and staff all very friendly.
Thanks a great stay
title: Great Hotel, lovely stay.

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text: We had a fantastic stay for our honeymoon. The staff were so lovely and the room was gorgeous. Breakfast was the best we've had on our trip so far, highly recommend the fish curry. Ameen was so friendly and made sure we had a great stay. We will definitely be back!
title: Perfect stay in the middle of Galle Fort

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
roomTip: Very central inside fort
text: This was our favourite hotel on our trip to sri lanka. Hotel is very central to all shops, restaurants and the beach. Room was beautiful, clean and well equipped with all modern amenities.  Fresh water supplied daily. Excellent food here, we had breakfast which was cooked fresh on order and really tasty. We ate out for dinner as hotel is expensive for food compared to the other restaurants.  We had a massage over the road for 15 pounds which was excellent.  Lady on reception was warm and had a great sense of humour. Great hotel, would definitely recommend
title: Best hotel on tour

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
roomTip: Plan breakfast if leaving early
text: A small hotel with a beautiful courtyard just off the Main Street inside the fort. The room was excellent, quiet and we had a lovely one night stay. Our only complaint was breakfast which wasn’t available until 8.00am and we were meeting a guide at 8.30 - the breakfast looked lovely but service was appallingly slow and badly managed so we didn’t have any. Otherwise well worth staying here
title: Lovely hotel in the centre of Galle Fort

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text: The hotel restaurant bears the name 1710 - the year the original structure was built. This is a well designed, luxury, boutique property in the heart of Galle fort. Though located on the main street of the fort, our room was quiet. The property has just a few rooms which we liked. We loved the welcome drink the quality of the meals at 1710. The ever smiling receptionist and staff made our brief stay memorable.
title: Heritage property in the heart of Galle fort

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text: The hotel is fabulous  and the staff friendly. Perfect location in the middle of the old fort area. We had an a huge stylish room. With ratan furniture and high ceilings. Only 4 stars as very patchy wifi reception (i only had 30 minutes for nights stay). Also, for us, it was far from the tranquille oasis we were promised,  the was a wedding at the next door hotel and the music was so loud and vibriting through our room! Appreciate that this out of the control of our hotel (and they asked for the music to be turned down!) but it ruined our stay.
title: Great hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
roomTip: No pool the only drawback to this charming small hotel in the heart of Galle.
text:
Beautiful, small ( 14 rooms ) hotel situated in heart of lovely old city of Galle.
All rooms have balconies but there is no pool.
Food is good but service is slow.
Very well appointed rooms & friendly attentive staff.
Close to all shops and tourist attractions in this historic town - worth doing a guided walking tour.
title: Well situated, small comfortable hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text: Loved this Hotel, an oasis right in the center of Galle. The attention to detail and the beautiful smells everywhere made it feel very luxurious. The arrival drink (Ayubowan) was delicious. Nothing was too much trouble for staff, Danuka even russled up an early, amazing breakfast for us at very short notice. Thank you!
title: Highly Recommend

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text:
The hotel is super conveniently located in the centre of the bustling bars, restaurants and shopping area of Galle Fort. We stayed 7 nights and the whole experience was exceptional. 
The room was large, bright and spotlessly clean with a huge en-suite shower. There was effective air-conditioning, which was definitely needed during our stay!, and the staff were just so friendly and helpful, from the security guard at the entrance right the way through to the manager.
The breakfast and evening food menus were very extensive and the quality of the food was excellent and you could choose to eat outside in shaded areas or in the air-conditioned restaurant.
There is also an external bar near the front of the property which is brilliant for having a drink while people watching!
Although the hotel was centrally located, the rooms were really quiet so you were never disturbed by any outside noises. 
Galle Fort is quite a small but lively and chic area with restaurants to cater for most tastes and plenty of places to stop and have a drink. A short 20 minute walk from the hotel takes you to Galle town which is more traditional Sri Lanka i.e., totally chaotic and full of tuk-tuks! 
The beaches surrounding the fort are not particularly brilliant for swimming but there are beaches within a 20 minute tuk-tuk ride which cost between £1.50 ($1.90) and £2.00 ($2.50) depending on the time of day.
Restaurants in the Fort area are more expensive than the other areas of Sri Lanka we visited, and just a main course with drinks would be between £40 ($50) - £50 ($63)  for 2 people. Elsewhere, on our travels. a similar meal would be between £15 ($20) - £30 ($38).
In summary, The Merchant is a beautiful hotel with great rooms, food and staff and is highly recommended if you are staying in Galle Fort.
title: I have nothing negative to say about this superb hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text: A lovely hotel and restaurant . The food was excellent, drinks lovely and the staff busy but very attentive. It was a lovely  setting in Galle Fort  with a wall to divide it from the bustling street outside. The restaurant manager went round making sure everything was ok and everyone was happy.
title: Lovely setting in Galle fort.

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text:
Indulging in the Sri Lankan Thali and Handallo Dish at 1710 by The Merchant Galle Fort was an unforgettable culinary adventure.

The Sri Lankan Thali, a traditional platter bursting with flavors, offered a tantalizing array of dishes, each showcasing the rich culinary heritage of Sri Lanka. The variety and balance of flavors in the Thali provided a true taste of Sri Lanka’s diverse cuisine.Equally delightful was the Handallo, a local specialty.

Beyond the exceptional food, The Merchant Galle Fort provided a charming and atmospheric setting to savor these culinary delights. Nestled within the historic Galle Fort, the restaurant’s ambiance exuded old-world charm, with its colonial-era architecture and intimate dining spaces. The attentive service and warm hospitality of the staff further enhanced the dining experience, making it a memorable journey through Sri Lanka’s culinary landscape.
title: “A Culinary Journey through Sri Lankan Delights: 1710 by The Merchant - Galle Fort Experience”

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}

text: Had an amazing time having dinner with my sister. The food was amazing and the wine too. We were served by Rizwan who gave amazing service. I totally recommend you visit if you’re in the area. The restaurant is very beautiful as well and has a lovely ambiance.

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text: We tried to eat here one night place was busy and we waited at the entrance for 5 mins but noone acknowledged us so I walked out . Another night we went in it was raining the tuk tuk guy got the security guy to get an umbrella to cover us on entering the restaurant which was nice .  Service was good . This was a more upmarket restaurant attached to a hotel . Surroundings were lovely as were the staff . I had calamari which I felt was a bit overcooked for me and a huge portion then I had the fish which was lovely . Hubby had tomato soup but when it arrived it was pumpkin which was fine he wasn't bothered followed by pasta which was nice . This was the most expensive meal we had in Galle with only soft drinks no alcohol but we did enjoy it . Nice meal for a special occasion not if your on a budget
title: Nice place worth a visit

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
roomTip: Go on the local guided walking tour with Walkers tours (can’t remember our guides name) he was great. Go early tho (7 am)as it gets very hot
text:
Perfectly located hotel within the Fort. Amazing room. Very comfortable bed, everything was spotless. 
Staff were very friendly. Breakfast was included and was ordered from an al a carte menu. Food was delicious!  The only thing I did notice was the there wasn’t a mirror in the main bedroom to use to dry yr hair. Wasn’t a problem for me as I tied it back. But could be a problem for some people. 
We thoroughly enjoyed our 2 day stay - no complaints what so ever. Thank you for a great stay !
title: Great hotel & very comfortable. Central location inside the Fort.

text: This hotel is a gem in the middle of a tourist destination. The rim we had was immaculately clean and a great size. The food was truly delicious (I had the Sri Lankan Thali - highly recommended). The staff were very helpful without being overbearing. Also the hotel manager was efficient and very knowledgeable. Great music too. Fabulous location. Highly highly recommended
title: An absolute gem

placeInfo: {'id': '26226338', 'name': 'The Merchant Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 325, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.02614, 'longitude': 80.21749, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d26226338-Reviews-The_Merchant_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://themerchantgallefort.com/', 'address': '64, Peddlers Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '64, Peddlers Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 5, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 19, 'count5': 297}}
text:
We stayed here for two nights and immediately were impressed by the central location of the hotel on the main street in the fort area of Galle, so close to all the shops, restaurants and bars. The architecture is also in keeping with the historic keepings of the area.

Despite arriving early we got access to our room and also got a slight upgrade which was well appreciated. The room was a good size, nicely decorated and with a decent bathroom (& heavenly shower). Wi-Fi was good.

We only ate breakfast here but that was very good with choices between western and local while all the staff were very friendly, happy and helpful.

If we come back to Galle we will definite staying here again.
title: A gem in the Galle fort area

text: We stayed here for 2 nights and ate breakfast and 2 dinners in the restaurant. The food was very nice and the service was exceptional.  Cocktails were also yummy. Accommodation was good with everything you need. Bed was a little hard but great pillows. Location was excellent inside the fort area.
title: Awesome Place

placeInfo: {'id': '2034349', 'name': 'Mango House', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 442, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026676, 'longitude': 80.21825, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d2034349-Reviews-Mango_House-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://gallefortmangohouse.com', 'address': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 5, 'count3': 17, 'count4': 90, 'count5': 329}}
text: The atmosphere was fantastic—so warm and inviting! The natural shade from the mango trees and umbrellas added a cool, relaxed vibe to the place. The food was delicious and well worth the price. A special thanks to Lal, who served us with a smile and made the experience even better with his great hospitality. Absolutely worth a visit!
title: Hidden Gem

placeInfo: {'id': '2034349', 'name': 'Mango House', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 442, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026676, 'longitude': 80.21825, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d2034349-Reviews-Mango_House-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://gallefortmangohouse.com', 'address': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 5, 'count3': 17, 'count4': 90, 'count5': 329}}
text: Small, attractively decorated boutique hotel set in a former cinnamon factory. My room was very comfortable and well-appointed, with a small balcony overlooking the rooftops of Galle Fort. It was very quiet too, other than the occasional sound of rain falling on the roof, which helped me fall asleep! The staff are friendly and very welcoming (the welcome ritual is a nice touch!), and the breakfast (served in the leafy  courtyard was particularly good, with a choice of fruit or buffalo milk curd with honey (a local specialty), followed by a main dish (hoppers for me).
title: Boutique hotel in a historic building in Galle Fort

placeInfo: {'id': '2034349', 'name': 'Mango House', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 442, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026676, 'longitude': 80.21825, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d2034349-Reviews-Mango_House-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://gallefortmangohouse.com', 'address': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 5, 'count3': 17, 'count4': 90, 'count5': 329}}
text: As an Irish traveler, I found Mango House Galle Fort to be a charming and peaceful haven within the fort's historic walls. The colonial-style décor and lush garden surroundings were absolutely stunning. The staff made me feel right at home with their warm, friendly service. It’s the perfect spot to relax while exploring the fascinating history and culture of Galle Fort.
title: My stay was awesome

placeInfo: {'id': '2034349', 'name': 'Mango House', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 442, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026676, 'longitude': 80.21825, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d2034349-Reviews-Mango_House-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://gallefortmangohouse.com', 'address': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 5, 'count3': 17, 'count4': 90, 'count5': 329}}
text: Every corner of the property felt intimate and thoughtfully curated. My mornings started in the lush garden with the scent of frangipani in the air, and the quiet made me feel worlds away from the busy town. The staff were exceptional, always greeting me with a smile and offering local tips that made my visit to Galle Fort even more enjoyable.

roomTip: No parking space if you are coming in car or motorbike
text: A decent place with basic amenities. The staff was helpful. The location was in the middle of the Dutch street and it was helpful to go for a walk and explore the places around. There are several restaurants around this place that you can explore. The in-house restaurant did not have a lot of options. They were very supportive when we tried to find an auto rickshaw to reach the bus station in time! The staff was very kind!
title: Decent place to stay

text: Mango House exceeded my expectations in every aspect! From the moment I walked in, the customer service was top-notch. text:
The food was great, service was excellent. I went twice during my stay in Galle. First night I had the veggie curry and second visit, the tandoori wrap. Top quality food. 
To drink, I had the passion fruit lassi (both times) - delicious. Well worth a visit!
title: Top Meal at the Mango House!!

placeInfo: {'id': '2034349', 'name': 'Mango House', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 442, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026676, 'longitude': 80.21825, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d2034349-Reviews-Mango_House-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://gallefortmangohouse.com', 'address': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 5, 'count3': 17, 'count4': 90, 'count5': 329}}
text: Spent a couple of nights at Mango House, which is a clean, comfortable and well-placed hotel to explore the Galle Fort from. While they have their own restaurant on-site you also have many options to select from just a walk away. My room was very nice overlooking a peaceful neighbourhood to which peacocks seem to be frequent visitors.
title: Great stay

placeInfo: {'id': '2034349', 'name': 'Mango House', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 442, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026676, 'longitude': 80.21825, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d2034349-Reviews-Mango_House-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://gallefortmangohouse.com', 'address': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 5, 'count3': 17, 'count4': 90, 'count5': 329}}
text: Beautifully decorated boutique hotel in an old house off the main tourist road. Quiet and serene hotel with beautiful antique furniture. Service was wonderful, great reception and hospitality. Breakfast in the courtyard is nice too- order the Sri Lankan version.
title: Beautifully decorated boutique hotel in a quiet setting

placeInfo: {'id': '2034349', 'name': 'Mango House', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 442, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026676, 'longitude': 80.21825, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d2034349-Reviews-Mango_House-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://gallefortmangohouse.com', 'address': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 5, 'count3': 17, 'count4': 90, 'count5': 329}}
text:
Fantastic old style hotel with beautiful courtyard garden and restaurant.
Room was excellent, very spacious and well equipped. Staff is very friendly and kind. The location of the hotel is excellent as it is pretty much in the middle of Galle Fort and close to the shops and magazine.
title: Great stay at Mango House!

placeInfo: {'id': '2034349', 'name': 'Mango House', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 442, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026676, 'longitude': 80.21825, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d2034349-Reviews-Mango_House-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://gallefortmangohouse.com', 'address': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 5, 'count3': 17, 'count4': 90, 'count5': 329}}
text: Wonderful diner night very friendly staff spacialy shiva and back ground music is nice highly recommended even if the garden is next to the road it quite and also the local food we choose was really delicious price are adopted to the location
title: Food

placeInfo: {'id': '2034349', 'name': 'Mango House', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 442, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026676, 'longitude': 80.21825, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d2034349-Reviews-Mango_House-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://gallefortmangohouse.com', 'address': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 5, 'count3': 17, 'count4': 90, 'count5': 329}}
text: A delightful and charming hideaway! Flavorful food for every palate, quiet and quaint rooms with the expected Sri Lanka ambiance and incredibly attentive staff. Would highly recommend for the solo traveler as well as couples and backpackers.
title: Look no further if you’re looking for a charming Sri Lankan getaway!

placeInfo: {'id': '2034349', 'name': 'Mango House', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 442, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026676, 'longitude': 80.21825, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d2034349-Reviews-Mango_House-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://gallefortmangohouse.com', 'address': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 5, 'count3': 17, 'count4': 90, 'count5': 329}}
text:
Visiting Galle and found this restaurant. The service was great and the food was brilliant, clearly freshly cooked.
The setting was brilliant in the covered garden an really enjoyed a lovely afternoon. The desert of fruit salad and ice cream was to die for
We are definitely coming back.
title: Mango Tree -Galle

placeInfo: {'id': '2034349', 'name': 'Mango House', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 442, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026676, 'longitude': 80.21825, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d2034349-Reviews-Mango_House-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://gallefortmangohouse.com', 'address': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 5, 'count3': 17, 'count4': 90, 'count5': 329}}
roomTip: Even if it looks busy go in and have a chat with the staff it's worth waiting for .
text:
Really lovely meal with hubby . I had lasagna it was home made really tasty and a big portion nicely presented . Hubby had mango chicken skewers with rice and salad chicken had a small kick to it v tasty . Staff were lovely very attentive . 
We could see into the small kitchen from where we sat kitchen looked clean chefs working hard . Place got busy after we arrived about 6.30 a few families, couples, friends atmosphere was good . Prices are reasonable . It's up a side street you wouldn't necessarily walk down we got out tuk tuk to take us straight there .Recommend the mango house and would definitely go back well done to all the staff great experience tonight x
title: A must visit in galle lovely food great price nice staff.

placeInfo: {'id': '2034349', 'name': 'Mango House', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 442, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026676, 'longitude': 80.21825, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d2034349-Reviews-Mango_House-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://gallefortmangohouse.com', 'address': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 5, 'count3': 17, 'count4': 90, 'count5': 329}}
roomTip: Check the room for damp!
text: The hotel is boutique and part of a restaurant in the centre of Galle Fort, so the location is great. Our room, however, on the ground floor let us down. We could smell damp as soon as we entered, and this came from the bathroom, which had mould on the door and was probably down to having no extraction fan.  We spoke to the manager and  tried to move but they only have a few rooms and were full, so we had no choice to stay put, however I was not happy about having to sleep in a damp room. It was shame as apart from this and one of the electric points not working, we would have been happy. The breakfast was fine and the restaurant area is full of beautiful plants
title: Could be great but...

placeInfo: {'id': '2034349', 'name': 'Mango House', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 442, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026676, 'longitude': 80.21825, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d2034349-Reviews-Mango_House-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://gallefortmangohouse.com', 'address': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 5, 'count3': 17, 'count4': 90, 'count5': 329}}
text:
We loved our stay at Mango House! The hotel has an old world charm.
The rooms were clean, quiet, and comfortable. The staff lovely: friendly and helpful, and the breakfast was delicious, with several choices.
For us, the location was perfect- right in Galle Fort. We enjoyed wandering the streets in the evening. There was music, art, lovely shops, and good restaurants.
I would  definitely recommend this hotel!
title: Charming!

placeInfo: {'id': '2034349', 'name': 'Mango House', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 442, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026676, 'longitude': 80.21825, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d2034349-Reviews-Mango_House-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://gallefortmangohouse.com', 'address': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 5, 'count3': 17, 'count4': 90, 'count5': 329}}
text: Highly recommended simple hotel tucked away but in the heart of the fort area. Eco friendly touches and extremely attentive staff. The food in the little bar and restaurant was outstanding. We were entertained by the monkeys visiting us during breakfast! This was a perfect start to our holiday in Sri Lanka!
title: Gorgeous little oasis in Galle

placeInfo: {'id': '2034349', 'name': 'Mango House', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 442, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026676, 'longitude': 80.21825, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d2034349-Reviews-Mango_House-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://gallefortmangohouse.com', 'address': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 5, 'count3': 17, 'count4': 90, 'count5': 329}}
text: There are many things to like about this hotel. One of them is that they are very eco-friendly. I wish US hotels did as much. Staff is super helpful. Oh and the bed linens are so nice and soft. Will definitely stay here again.  Plentiful breakfast
title: Charming hotel inside the fort!

placeInfo: {'id': '2034349', 'name': 'Mango House', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 442, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026676, 'longitude': 80.21825, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d2034349-Reviews-Mango_House-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://gallefortmangohouse.com', 'address': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3 Leyn Baan Cross Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 5, 'count3': 17, 'count4': 90, 'count5': 329}}

roomTip: Finding parking inside the Galle Fort can be a bit tricky. However, Church Street where Fort Bazaar is located is the widest street and you should not have a problem.
text:
Fort Bazaar is my third experience with Teardrop hotels. Like all hotels and villas at Teardrop, Fort Bazaar is the perfect blend of the historical Ceylon and the contemporary island. 

It is conveniently located in the heart of the Galle Fort with close access to the Fort's many attractions. Fort Bazaar itself is a prime example of the colonial architecture tastefully redecorated by Teardrop hotels. 

We booked two rooms and the staff at Fort Bazaar was thoughtful enough to give us two rooms that connected internally. It felt like a suite. The rooms were very spacious and the mini bar was complementary. 

The package included a complementary evening tea, alcohol and mocktails but to me, the most treasured experience was the guided tour round the Galle Fort. Special thanks to Mr. Tharanga Liayanage Arachchi who is a wealth of knowledge. He has a genuine interest in preserving this UNESCO heritage site for the future generations.

Fort Bazaar is a probably a high end villa but do keep an eye for promotions. You wouldn't regret a penny spent.
title: Totally worth it!

placeInfo: {'id': '9981243', 'name': 'Fort Bazaar', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 636, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026914, 'longitude': 80.21762, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d9981243-Reviews-Fort_Bazaar-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://teardrop-hotels.com/fort-bazaar/', 'address': '26 Church Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '26 Church Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 6, 'count3': 15, 'count4': 102, 'count5': 513}}
text:
My wife and I spent a wonderful night in the Fort Bazaar Hotel in Galle Sri Lanka. What a lovely hotel—everything was top class.

We were warmly greeted and offered cool towels and welcome drinks. Check-in was very speedy and we were given a quick tour of the lobby and restaurants before going to our room. 

The room was quite large with a queen/king bed. Everything throughout the room was clean and looked very comfortable. The bathroom and shower were also quite large. Our room, toward the back of the hotel and on the upper floor, was very quite and we had a sound and comfortable sleep. There are tea and coffee making facilities in the room.

I think this would be regarded as a boutique hotel—it had a small few rooms and is not affiliated with any chain.

Breakfast is a la carte, with a wide range of choices. I had pancakes and they were delicious. The coffee was high quality--really good! There’s a happy hour in the afternoon and wine/beer is free to guests.

Wifi is speedy and reliable.

All the staff in the hotel were most friendly; made sure we were welcomed; and readily answered all our questions.

The Fort Bazaar Hotel is very centrally located—a short walk from all the historical fort sites, cricket grounds, restaurants, and shops in Galle.
title: Lovely stay at Fort Bazaar Hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '9981243', 'name': 'Fort Bazaar', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 636, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026914, 'longitude': 80.21762, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d9981243-Reviews-Fort_Bazaar-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://teardrop-hotels.com/fort-bazaar/', 'address': '26 Church Street, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '26 Church Street', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 6, 'count3': 15, 'count4': 102, 'count5': 513}}
text:
Galle is fairly crowded with tourists but once you go into Fort Bazaar there is a peaceful, quiet aura.  I had a room with a balcony which I loved.  Every morning at about 7:30 I was visited by a resident peacock. And sometime with his mate.  Who knew that peacocks crowed like roosters.  Loudly.  The first morning I think I was a little annoyed but when I went to the balcony to see what the heck was going on and found a peacock strutting around I caved and fell in love with this unexpected guest.  The second morning his girlfriend came by which meant that he was dancing around with his brilliant feathers fanned out behind him. The third morning, same thing.  And the show was just for me.  I won’t forget it.  

The Galle Fort location is convenient if you want to take day trips to some of the coastal surfing towns.  I especially liked Hiriketiya and Dickwalla. It’s pretty easy to set up a car and driver. The food at Fort Bazaar is very good and the selection of restaurants in the area is also quite nice,
title: A sublime oasis while visiting shall and the South Coast.

text: Such a lovely building. An old merchants house within the fort walls. 20 very spacious rooms. Lovely peaceful areas to sit and relax. Here 4 nights but onky ate once here but that was lovely food. No pool but Unawatuna beach only a short tuk tuk ride away (which was great fun in itself). text: In a country where a warm welcome and always helpful attentive service is of a high standard, the Fort Bazaar manages to stand out. title: Super staff

text:
Such a lovely hotel in the fort of Galle. Excellent convenient location to explore the fort which contains many historic attractions, excellent restaurants and great shops.
The staff here are exceptional and couldn’t do enough for us from the first time we stepped through the door until the time we left.
Whilst we didn’t eat dinner the quality of the breakfast and afternoon tea would lead us to believe the chef is very competent.
The afternoon tea and happy hour complimentary drinks were an added bonus to a lovely stay. 
Thank you to all the staff for making our stay so memorable
title: Fabulous Boutique Hotel in Galle
