text:
Nice and clean, but EXTREMELY overpriced. 
This hotel takes advantage of the terrible state of other hotels in Galle and charges at least 3 times what it really is worth. Rooms are clean and modern, but nothing more than an average western hotel. Then the staff pester your every move trying to compensate.
Rooms don't even have a kettle for tea and coffee.
title: Pleasant, but I would pass.

text: The photos don’t do it justice as you can’t communicate how peaceful it is, how wonderful the staff were, how amazing the whole place is and how great the food is. We stayed one night from the UK and wished we could have stayed longer! From the greeting, all through the stay and to when we left every staff member was kind, helpful, friendly and the peacefulness of the place even reflected in the staff! They were very welcoming to the children; one of which described it as like being at home - (the dog and cats who lived there helped!) The whole place was perfectly clean. We all loved it and would stay again if we ever came back.
title: Wow - perfect!

placeInfo: {'id': '498699', 'name': 'Lady Hill', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 469, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.03871, 'longitude': 80.21876, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d498699-Reviews-Lady_Hill-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.ladyhillsl.com/', 'address': '29 Upper Dickson Road, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '29 Upper Dickson Road', 'street2': '', 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 20, 'count2': 19, 'count3': 52, 'count4': 174, 'count5': 204}}
roomTip: Dine at the restaurant even if don't stay here. The Villa Upper Dixon is half the price, half as nice but short climb up to here.
text: The rooftop restaurant is one of the loveliest restaurants I've ever been to and I've been in elegant restaurants all over the world. Breathtaking views of Galle 300 degrees around. The kitchen is in full view for the remaining 60 degrees. Get the Lion Ice beer and Jumbo Prawns, skip the filet fish is served on a hotplate so unless you eat fast it ends up being overdone. Service is impeccable, unlike the pretentious and yet obsequious rushed and interrupting American style. Not cheap by Sri Lankan standards but an excellent value by European or American sensibilities. Come an hour before sunset, and it's a climb but a nice hike up the hill. Don't pay a Tuktuk more than 500 from the fort area. I would call this a MUST visit.
title: One of the best experiences in my 63 years

placeInfo: {'id': '498699', 'name': 'Lady Hill', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 469, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.03871, 'longitude': 80.21876, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d498699-Reviews-Lady_Hill-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.ladyhillsl.com/', 'address': '29 Upper Dickson Road, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '29 Upper Dickson Road', 'street2': '', 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 20, 'count2': 19, 'count3': 52, 'count4': 174, 'count5': 204}}
roomTip: If walking uphill in heat to hotel after a day out is a problem, return from fort area by tuk tuk - 50p for two people from Dutch Fort.
text:
I recently undertook a two week tour of Sri Lanka in a group of six and we stayed in 8 different hotels during our trip.  This hotel was my favourite and I can unreservedly recommend it.  It is situated on a hill about 20 mins walk from the scenic Dutch Fort district and has superb views across the city.   The staff went out of their way to welcome us on arrival and throughout our stay the service we received….reception, housekeeping, restaurant and management…was warm, friendly and efficient. Nothing was too much trouble.  The room I stayed in was spacious, clean and although the hotel itself is colonial, (once a vicarage for the head of the CofE in Galle) the rooms are bright, modern and comfortable. There were lots of English channels available on TV should you wish to relax and watch something other than BBC news which is what was available in most other places.  The restaurant cooks food to order so we had a plentiful supply of freshly cooked food of a high standard and we were entertained by a lovely young singer/guitarist while dining in the evening. As it was my birthday whilst there the group leader arranged for a delicious birthday cake presented to me after breakfast.  A group of about six staff came to see us off on our departure which was a nice, personal touch which we appreciated. 
Do not be put off that it is up a hill. The walk down is easy but some might find it a bit of a pull back up when it’s hot. Tuk tuks are absolutely everywhere and from the fort district the fare for two people was only 200 rupees (50p!) if you didn’t want to walk the return uphill journey.  Just agree the price first and insist if it seems any higher.   And once back to the hotel, take a dip in the pool - clean and like a warm bath - a real delight as the sun sets.
title: A warm welcome at an excellent hotel

roomTip: Choose the captain and admiral rooms on the first floor.
text:
Rich history but lots of improvement. 

The staff at Tamarind Hill Hotel is friendly and accommodating, there are some areas of concern. Although the maintenance is generally good, there were issues with the AC in the suite room, making for an uncomfortable night, especially with a toddler. This  is also because of April summer. 

This property requires maintenance in a lot of areas.
title: Boutique hotel with history but need maintenance

placeInfo: {'id': '1477843', 'name': 'Tamarind Hill by Asia Leisure', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 942, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.044482, 'longitude': 80.19719, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d1477843-Reviews-Tamarind_Hill_by_Asia_Leisure-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.instagram.com/tamarindhillgalle/', 'address': 'No 288, Galle Road, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'No 288, Galle Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 6, 'count2': 8, 'count3': 34, 'count4': 127, 'count5': 767}}
roomTip: It’s a $3 tuk tuk dive to Galle centre … and a 5 minute walk to the beach near the Jetwing lighthouse hotel.
text:
A hidden gem , an exquisite colonial home with grand proportions,  beautiful furniture and discreet areas to relax in . Staff are well meaning and in abundance , they may not speak much English- but I didn’t even try to communicate in Singhalese. There are only 12 rooms - all are very spacious and decorated with individual mahogany furniture . It’s NOT the Hilton or Radisson … thank goodness…. So don’t expect mini bar and extensive menu . The dinner from the limited menu was delicious , I would like to have seen more local dishes on offer . No wine license - but take your own.
A peaceful retreat , very serene , no piped music, and a feeling that you are staying in a friend’s home.
There is a resident turtle in the pond , peacocks grace the courtyard in the morning, monkeys can be seen in the jungle behind , a mongoose crossed the drive this morning.
I hope no one spoils this little haven .
The pool was clean and we had it to ourselves . 
Thank you Tamarind Hill .
title: Hidden Jewel

placeInfo: {'id': '1477843', 'name': 'Tamarind Hill by Asia Leisure', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 942, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.044482, 'longitude': 80.19719, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d1477843-Reviews-Tamarind_Hill_by_Asia_Leisure-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.instagram.com/tamarindhillgalle/', 'address': 'No 288, Galle Road, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'No 288, Galle Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 6, 'count2': 8, 'count3': 34, 'count4': 127, 'count5': 767}}
text:
An authentic hotel left in its original state.
Lots of charm for this establishment located 10 minutes by tuk tuk from Fort Galle.
We really enjoyed this Sinhalese night in the heart of its flora and fauna. It can be a trying night, with animal cries, morning prayers and wedding set-ups at 6 a.m., but it has a unique charm. I loved the colonial style of the place, as if An authentic hotel left in its original state.
title: Loved the colonial style

ownerResponse:
{'id': '967355536', 'text': 'Dear Belinda,
 
Thank you very much for choosing to stay at The Fort Printers and sharing your feedback with us. We are deeply sorry to hear that your expectations were not fulfilled, particularly the noise level during the breakfast hours at our restaurant. 
 
To preserve a pleasant ambiance for all our guests in the future, we have communicated our concern on the noise level to the neighbouring property and  briefed all our staff members to actively monitor the music sound level around our premises. 
 
Although we pride ourselves on maintaining the highest level of service standards for our guests, we are very disappointed this time that we could not provide better ambiance during your time at The Fort Printers. 
 
We hope to welcome you back to provide a better experience in the future so you can experience our hospitality in calm surroundings.  

Best regards,

Sadar Mohamed. ', 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-08-29', 'responder': 'The Fort Printers', 'connectionToSubject': 'General Manager'}
placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
text: We had two nights in the huge and beautifully appointed Headmaster’s Room. Breakfast at the  hotel was terrific. But our experience was seriously marred by the loud live music booming from the bar across the road from late afternoon until 10 pm, the doof doof electronic music playing in the hotel all day, the base notes from which boomed through to our room and into the breakfast room making the whole experience far from relaxing.
title: Disappointing

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
roomTip: The historic wing is very special and the rooms very spacious.
text: Fantastic colonial building that has been restored to a high standard.  We had two rooms, one in the Church wing which was modern and the large Arts room in the historic wing with soaring ceiling, desk, sofa and the covered veranda outside the door.  Both rooms were very quiet and the beds were comfortable.  Amenities include four different areas to dine or have a drink, and an inviting outdoor lap pool.  Friendly, helpful staff which accommodated all our requests.  Exceptional breakfasts, including a Sri Lankan breakfast which needs to be pre-ordered.  Great location to explore Galle Fort and a peaceful refuge to return to.  Highly recommend.
title: Perfect hotel is Galle Fort

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
text:
The fort printers is a wonderful small boutique hotel in the middle of galle fort. We had a poor experience in another nearby hotel (poor air conditioning, noisy) and decided we would try and shift. In the morning we went into the hotel and the manager gave us a good rate so we moved. The rooms are lovely, well appointed, quiet, comfortable bed. Breakfast is outstanding, the best we had in Sri Lanka. Staff are very helpful. My partner had an accident with a Tuk Tuk and they were very supportive. Fortunately she was OK -we were very impressed by the care they showed. A great feature of the hotel is the pool, very rare in the old part of Galle, and with the heat, a great relief during the day. The location of the hotel is perfect, everything you need, cafes, shops, the sea, sites etc are a short walk.
Highly recommended!!
title: great hotel experience

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
roomTip: Nothing
text: Family of 4 with teenage children. We loved everything about this place, the food the decor, the service the area… would definitely come back if we ever come back to Sri Lanka. We like to have little moments on a family holiday where we do something extra special and this was it. We were not disappointed!
title: We LOVED it here…

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
text:
We stayed just for one night as part of a tour for our 30th wedding anniversary. 

The staff were very welcoming and were given the Headmasters suite which was just amazing!!!.

2 minutes after checking into the room a staff member appeared with 2 glasses of proscecco for us for our anniversary 
.
The pool/terrace area at the hotel is lovely and we enjoyed  a drink in the Evening.

The hotel is also located right in the main street of the Fort so great location.

Thank you for a great stay
title: Great hotel with lots of Character in Central location

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
text:
Absolutely stunning boutique hotel in Galle. Minimalistic modern decor in a historic gorgeous building which used to function as the printers press hundreds of years ago. Rooms are romantic and expertly laid out and immaculately clean.
Centrally located and wonderful staff.
Highly recommend staying here.
title: Love love love this romantic historic boutique hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
roomTip: We stayed in the Headmasters suite which was absolutely wonderful
text:
A beautiful colonial building converted into a boutique hotel right in the heart of Galle. 

We stayed in the Headmasters suite and it was fabulous.  As the name suggests the history is this building used to be a school and then a printers.  It is now a lovely boutique hotel.

I have to mention the exceptional service from the staff who were absolutely wonderful.  Having travelled a long day in the heat to get here my wife was feeling a little unwell with headache and nausea and the staff were so nice and helpful bringing up special tea and offering great help and service.  They really did go above and beyond.

The hotel does great breakfasts and we ate lunch here which was first class as well.

There are a few other similar colonial style boutique hotels and we had a drink in some and had dinner in one, but we were very happy we stayed at The Fort Printers.  

Galle is a lovely old colonial town and has a few very nice craft shops.  Better than anywhere else we stayed in Sri Lanka including Kandy.  

There is a small swimming pool in the inner courtyard which we didn't actually use but looked nice.
title: Great boutique hotel in the heart of Galle

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
text: A very quirky hotel that has been several things over the years, printers, school etc. Large rooms, good air con, very small swimming pool but this was a welcome relief from the scorching sun. Breakfast was lovely although you need plenty of time.
title: Quirky

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
text:
This charming heritage hotel is housed in a vintage building that is a few hundred years old and used to be the site of a School at one point. So the rooms here are creatively named after various subjects in school like HISTORY, GEOGRAPHY, ARTS, etc!

LOCATION: Excellent location in the heart of the old town of Galle Fort and an easy walk away from all key points of interest

DINE + DRINK: They have a lovely poolside bar and the place that serves breakfast is spread across some very interesting spaces of this old property that are tastefully decorated. Breakfast was delicious (especially the Sri Lankan dishes) and is absolutely worth waking up for!

ROOM: We stayed in a Room called HISTORY, so this review is based on that;  SIZE: Huge enough for 2 adults and a wide array of baggage; VIEW: Not a great view as it is surrounded by buildings on all sides; AIR-CON: Perfectly functioning cooler that helped in setting the perfect room temperature; BED: Comfortable bed that played the expected part of putting us to sleep; BATHROOM: Stand-in shower; TOILETRIES: good apa quality toiletries

FACILITIES: No Gym on site. But they have a beautiful pool on site. Narrow, but longish and charming.

SERVICE: Friendly staff that took care of all our needs with a smile and made us feel pampered and well taken care of. Special Shout-out to Madushee at the front office.

HOW WIRED YOU WILL BE: Free Wi-Fi that works well all over the property, and the speed is good!
title: Heritage Charmer at a great location!

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
text:
A lovely unique hotel right in the middle of the Dutch Fortress.  Really fab. Professional staff who were very welcoming; and a truly superb Western breakfast
 (including granola).   The area is buzzing and everything about this hotel is geared up to the customers needs.  I would highly recommend it.
title: Fort Printer - a fab hotel in Galle

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
roomTip: See if rooms in back or interior may avoid noise from in front restaurant
text: Lovely hotel. The room was magnificent with a wonderful canopied bed. The small pool is very welcome. The breakfasts are delightful with various choices, including a Sri Lankan breakfast, which my wife had both days and loved. The manager was both charming and knowledgeable and was able to make helpful recommendations . My only negative comment is that the restaurant across the street had live LOUD music until 10 PM both nights we were there. They did stop promptly at that time but, before then, they were quite annoying. Perhaps a room in the back would be quieter. We were able to occupy ourselves until 10 PM and it was more in the nature of a mild annoyance. I would definitely stay here again.
title: Great Galle Hôtel

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
text:
Very beatiful holland period hotel.
The rooms are very spacious and comfortable, with all the services that you need.
The staff is lovely and always ready for your needs.
Staying inside the fort is a unique experience and the fort hotel is very characteristic
title: Splendid hotel and very lovely staff

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
roomTip: I couldn’t fault it
text:
This hotel and staff were fantastic, I would like to give a special shout to Manoj, sorry if I didn’t spell it correctly, he went above and beyond to help is when we first got there. I can’t speak highly enough of the staff they always greeted you with a smile and were extremely polite. When we first got there and saw it was a set al carte menu I was like I will still be hungry after this but the portion size was more than efficient and was full every day and the tea is delicious. When we arrived the young woman at the desk was very informative and gave us a map of Galle which was a great help. Oh and thank you to lovely you man whom brought us breakfast due an early departure. Thank you so much for making our safe amazing. And the owners of this hotel should be very very proud of there staff

I have attached some pics the fella outside the hotel was exceptional also 😊

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
text:
We stayed here for three nights and had one supper. Excellent staff, really helpful, nothing to much trouble.
Breakfast really clever. Great Sri Lankan fish curry in basket of crispy bread and egg custard with rice one day, morrocan eggs another. Supper superb crispy pork belly then Mahdi mani fish.
I can’t eat chilli or spicy food and they cooked milder food especially for me.
Ishaliyanage superb at coordinating everything for us so especial thanks (see photos).
Madhu manager also helpful.
Ishaliyanage booked restaurants, Tuk Tuk and generally brilliant.
30 staff for 13 rooms.terrace onto Main Street to drink and people watch. Food by pool or inside. Wonderful
title: If you dont stay here your bonkers!!

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
text:
A very comfortable and smallish boutique hotel right in the middle of the historic old town. Its within easy walking distance of a number of historic city features, the beach and many restaurants and bars. The famous cricket club is a slightly longer but comfortable walk and the fish market a little further beyond where you can watch the nets being hand pulled from the beach by teams of fishermen.

The hotel rooms are large, comfortable and well appointed. Privacy slightly compromised by thin walls and glass partitioning in sections. We stayed for two nights and ate breakfast here which was of high quality both days. We ate out both nights so cannot comment on the evening dining.

Service from all the staff was excellent throughout our stay.
title: Comfortable stay in Galle

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
text:
Our three-night stay in the Headmasters suite at the historic Fort Printers hotel was one of the highlights of our time in Sri Lanka. 

An oasis of air-conditioned calm, with sincere, friendly staff and ideally located amongst the bustling shops, cafes, bars and restaurants at the heart of Galle Fort's World Heritage site, we loved our spacious, airy, high-ceilinged suite and delicious breakfast choices in the poolside central courtyard.

Only small comments were lack of tissues or amenity kits, and (as other reviewers have previously noted) this suite is multi-level - even the bed is up a few steps - so not ideal for anyone with mobility issues (or who sleepwalks!!).
title: Historic charm in perfect central Galle Fort location

text: We enjoyed our stay in the Head Masters Suite.  We had just 1 night - the room was lovely and spacious and we enjoyed our breakfast in the courtyard by the pool.  (Just to note the room has several steps to navigate if you have mobility issues).  The hotel is in a perfect location to explore Galle.

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
roomTip: Get your laundry done before you arrive here
text:
Overall it was a great place to stay, great location with plenty of restaurants in easy walking distance. The staff make this hotel excellent Sampal rush around looking after me and nothing was to much trouble.
Personally I don’t like that everything is priced in USD , I think stick with the Rupee. It felt like they were trying to pull the wool over my eyes. It is expensive for drinks and laundry,
title: Lovely and quirky

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
text:
Last month me and my wife went to Sri Lanka and our destination was Fort Printers which is located in Galle Fort. We had a warm and friendly welcome by pretty lady. The entire hotel atmosphere was very nice and if you wish to visit there you can feel a Dutch Era vibe. 
The front office girl "Ishu" was described about galle fort with a map and it was a really helpful to us because that was our very first visit in Sri Lanka. 
We were accomadated at a modern type room which is called Church suite. But according to my opinion, if you want to stay at this property please make a reservation for a heritage suite because that was coming with nice historical story. 
And other special part is coffee. Can highly recommend because that coffee was amazing and ever best taste in my life. 
Will definitely see you in next visit. We wish you guys good luck !
title: Well spent vacation

placeInfo: {'id': '602863', 'name': 'The Fort Printers', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 812, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026105, 'longitude': 80.21802, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d602863-Reviews-The_Fort_Printers-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://thefortprinters.com/', 'address': '39 Pedlar St, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '39 Pedlar St', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 41, 'count4': 181, 'count5': 568}}
text: Lovely first night stay of our Sri Lankan trip. Very comfortable room, delightful staff and a scrummy Sri Lankan breakfast, excellent egg hoppers! Ideally situated to explore historic centre of Galle yet feels small and boutique. Would recommend .

placeInfo: {'id': '15111854', 'name': 'The Heritage Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 159, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026928, 'longitude': 80.21778, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d15111854-Reviews-The_Heritage_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.theheritage.lk', 'address': '27,Church Street ,, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '27,Church Street ,', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 3, 'count4': 29, 'count5': 127}}
roomTip: Just relax and really enjoy yourself...
text: I was so happy staying at this hotel. It is beautiful; designed by Ashley de Vos who was a student of Geoffrey Bawa. Clean and pleasing to the eye from the white frangipani trees to the squirrels in their branches. The food is good and it is conveniently located but best of all are the people. The staff are so helpful and kind from the manger who drove me himself to the chemists when I found I had left my medicine behind to Padmini the massage lady who gives such wonderfully soothing massages. When it was time to leave all I could say was, "But I don't want to go. Are the citizenship requirements in your country very difficult?'
title: I was so happy at Heritage Galle Fort

placeInfo: {'id': '15111854', 'name': 'The Heritage Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 159, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026928, 'longitude': 80.21778, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d15111854-Reviews-The_Heritage_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.theheritage.lk', 'address': '27,Church Street ,, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '27,Church Street ,', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 3, 'count4': 29, 'count5': 127}}
text:
To summarize, The Heritage Hotel offers more than just accommodation; it provides an experience steeped in history, and unparalleled hospitality.  The property's heritage charm is evident in every corner, from the intricately carved furnishings to the antique artifacts and furniture every where in the hotel and rooms. With a perfect location inside the Galle Fort, you can easily explore the fort at your convenience. The staff shows warmth and professionalism, attending to your every need with smile and personalized attention - whether it's arranging bespoke city tours or accommodating special dietary requirements.

Pro Tip: Try their Srilanka breakfast its really good.
title: Truly Heritage

placeInfo: {'id': '15111854', 'name': 'The Heritage Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 159, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026928, 'longitude': 80.21778, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d15111854-Reviews-The_Heritage_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.theheritage.lk', 'address': '27,Church Street ,, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '27,Church Street ,', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 3, 'count4': 29, 'count5': 127}}

placeInfo: {'id': '15111854', 'name': 'The Heritage Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 159, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026928, 'longitude': 80.21778, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d15111854-Reviews-The_Heritage_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.theheritage.lk', 'address': '27,Church Street ,, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '27,Church Street ,', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 3, 'count4': 29, 'count5': 127}}
roomTip: Select rooms in the top floor
text:
My husband and I had to visit family in Galle and rather than coming back on same day, both of us wanted to experience the present Galle Fort @ night. My husband's family were living inside Galle Fort for over 5 decades and their house is now a Villa owned by a foreigner. 
We were looking at all options to stay over for one night and our main criteria was to get with car parking . There was only one option The Heritage which had car park in the premises and matched our requirements. Our room was on the top floor facing the garden and we could see restaurant beyond. Though the rooms are on 1 and 2nd floors above ground there is an elevator to take us up and down. 
Staying inside Galle Fort gave us the opportunity of walking along the ramparts in the evening as done by us when the family lived on Parawa Street. This brought us many memories. It was a good choice of selecting The Heritage (previously known as 'Kotuwe Kade') which gave us good rest to sleep in. Room was very comfortable with all amenities and the bed was great. Washroom and the Toilet looked brand new with good flow of hot and cold water. 
One of the special item that caught my eye as I checked in was the antique telephone that is used as an intercom. 
One more I would like to comment is the room service. Next day we tried making morning tea and noticed that the kettle was not working and we informed. Within a matter of few minutes we heard a tap on the door and one of the staff is there with a spare kettle. We valued the splendid service. 
Overall the staff was very friendly - room service, the restaurant and whom we spoke with during our stay. 
Food was good and we selected the Sri Lankan menu. They had hoppers, Pan Cake, Milk Rice and String Hoppers with suitable curries to match with. There was a flow of fruits as deserts. 
Overall our stay was pleasant and enjoyable leaving behind lasting memories. 
Thank you - The Heritage
title: Pleasant and Enjoyable Stay in side the Galle Fort

placeInfo: {'id': '15111854', 'name': 'The Heritage Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 159, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026928, 'longitude': 80.21778, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d15111854-Reviews-The_Heritage_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.theheritage.lk', 'address': '27,Church Street ,, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '27,Church Street ,', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 3, 'count4': 29, 'count5': 127}}
text:
A comfortable hotel with a relaxed and friendly feel. Our room was on the third floor overlooking the central area with its pretty Temple Trees. It was a nice size room with very comfortable beds and cosy bedding. A spacious bathroom with a powerful shower was very welcome for a hose down in the morning and after a day out and about. 

We really enjoyed the breakfast which was a choice of European or Sri Lankan, what a feast, fruit platter,  pastries, eggs, toast plus juice, tea and coffee. The only negative was the coffee, I am super fussy and it wasn’t to my liking.

Having stayed in many of the hotels in Galle Fort I would definitely choose The Heritage Hotel again. We didn’t eat in the restaurant but friends did and they were impressed with the selection of delicious vegetarian curries. 

The location is very central on Church Street where a nice choice of restaurants and other hotels are located. The Pasta Factory opposite the gates serves truly authentic Italian fare. For a Latte or Cappuccino fix it has to be Fort Bazzar on Church Street. 

Thank You to the lovely restaurant  breakfast staff who brought me breakfast to the room when I felt unwell one morning.
title: A five star stay in the Galle Fort!

placeInfo: {'id': '15111854', 'name': 'The Heritage Galle Fort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 159, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.026928, 'longitude': 80.21778, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d15111854-Reviews-The_Heritage_Galle_Fort-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.theheritage.lk', 'address': '27,Church Street ,, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '27,Church Street ,', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 3, 'count4': 29, 'count5': 127}}
text:
We were booked at another hotel within Galle Fort which told us they had double booked and there was no room for us for one night - so The Heritage was our second choice. We liked the place so much we cancelled the first hotel we had booked and stayed at The Heritage for our entire holiday. 
Its a quiet, clean, spacious hotel with wonderfully warm and friendly staff. Our room was large with probably the largest bed we had ever slept on and the bathroom was also spacious. We loved the huge veranda with comfy lounge chairs, a perfect place for reading and chilling. On site free parking is a huge bonus for a hotel inside the Fort. 
The food is very good and the Sri Lankan coffee is excellent. The lovely garden with Araliya trees next to the dining area is very relaxing. The spa is small but the therapists are excellent and the prices are reasonable. We had to check out early and the staff were very accommodating, making sure we had an excellent early breakfast before departure. 
The location of the hotel is great, very central to many restaurants, shops, the ramparts and all the other attractions of the beautiful Galle Fort. We really enjoyed our stay at this wonderful hotel and we will definitely be back.
title: Spacious and comfortable Hotel with wonderful staff

text: We were recently meant to stay at the heritage hotel for 1 night, but unfortunately the room had issues. The manager was very accomodating and already found us another hotel to stay at. The room was lovely and spacious. He also gave us a bottle of wine and encouraged us to come for lunch and dinner. He made good of a bad situation, which we are very grateful of. ownerResponse:
{'id': '942257862', 'text': "Hi Vikash,

We sincerely apologize for the experience you had during your recent stay at our hotel. We understand that your expectations were not met, and for that, we extend our deepest apologies. Please be informed that we have undergone recent ownership and management changes aimed at improving our services and guest experiences. We would appreciate another opportunity to showcase the improvements we've made. Please reach out to us directly, and we’ll ensure your next visit is nothing short of exceptional.

We do not discriminate between our guest. Our room inventory is channel through a software system to multiple different OTA's such as Agoda. There could have been a temporary hold on our inventory when you called which would have led to our front office team informing you about rooms being full. We apologize for the same.

Regards", 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-03-14', 'responder': None, 'connectionToSubject': None}
placeInfo: {'id': '25562010', 'name': 'Blue Beach Galle', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 28, 'locationString': 'Galle, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.03348, 'longitude': 80.23784, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g297896-d25562010-Reviews-Blue_Beach_Galle-Galle_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://bbgalle.com/', 'address': '447 Matara Rd, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '447 Matara Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Galle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 3, 'count4': 10, 'count5': 14}}
roomTip: If you're a local. Don't call. Just book online and show up.
text:
I was told that there are no rooms via phone call. But I was able to book one through Agoda. Which only proves that they were not welcoming to Locals. 

I had to wait 1 hour after the time that my room was supposed to be ready. 

Our bed sheet and pillow cases were sprinkled with human hair. As if they did not change them in a hurry or the room service person had a case of hair fall. 

They changed our room and there was little less hair in the new room. But we couldn't be bothered moving again. Also  the Air-conditioning in the new room was not going below 27 or 26 degrees. Engineers came to check on it and  just opened the room and started working despite us not responding as we were in the balcony. We came in to find out a stranger in our room fixing the AC. But still didn't fix it. 

The food is good for the price .Buffet breakfast with Sri Lankan food . 

Nice place. Decent staff . Bad management.
title: Not  genuine management.Not very sanitary
